S04bsu021_u:483: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamadbhagavan aṣṭottarapadaśatam?

S04bsu021_u:751: yamāśritya tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitānāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedaṃ deśayanti,

S04bsu021_u:763: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nanu bhagavan vikalpasyāpravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā anumimīmahe vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /
S04bsu021_u:764: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /

S04bsu021_u:801_1: bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - kathaṃ bhagavan svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati yugapatkramavṛttyā vā?

S04bsu021_u:1269: tadyathā mahāmate deve pravarṣati jalabudbudakāḥ sphaṭikamaṇisadṛśāḥ khyāyante /

S04bsu021_u:1272: evameva mahāmate tīrthyadṛṣṭivikalpāśayavāsanāvāsitā asataścotpādaṃ varṇayiṣyanti pratyayaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:1275: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pramāṇatrayāvayavapratyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā āryajñānapratyātmādhigamyaṃ svabhāvadvayavinirmuktaṃ vastu svabhāvato vidyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti /

S04bsu021_u:1278: sa evaiṣāmātmagrāhaḥ poṣagrāhaḥ puruṣagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāhaḥ syāt /

S04bsu021_u:1286: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāni sarvarūpapratibimbakāni khyāyante yathāpratyayataḥ svavikalpanācca,

S04bsu021_u:1360: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate /

S04bsu021_u:1386: punaraparaṃ mahāmate adhiṣṭhānadvayādhiṣṭhitā bodhisattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ caraṇayornipatya praśnān paripṛcchanti /
S04bsu021_u:1389: tatra mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau buddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpadyante /
S04bsu021_u:1390: samanantarasamāpannānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ bodhisattvasamādhim,
S04bsu021_u:1391: atha daśadiglokadhātuvyavasthitāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā mukhānyupadarśya sarvakāyamukhavācāsaṃdarśanenādhiṣṭhānaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu021_u:1392: yathā mahāmate vajragarbhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyeṣāṃ ca tādṛglakṣaṇaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,

S04bsu021_u:1401: yadi punarmahāmate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānamantareṇa pratibhānaṃ pratibhāyāt,
S04bsu021_u:1405: tṛṇagulmavṛkṣaparvatā api mahāmate vividhāni ca vādyabhāṇḍāni nagarabhavanagṛhavimānāsanasthānāni tathāgatapraveśādhiṣṭhānena pravādyante /

S04bsu021_u:1408_1: mahāsattvānāṃ samādhisamāpattyavasthānakāle viśeṣabhūmau ca abhiṣekādhiṣṭhānaṃ prakurvanti? (Vaidya 43)

S04bsu021_u:1416: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - pratītyasamutpādaṃ punarbhagavatā deśayatā kāraṇavyapadeśa eva kṛto na svanayaprakṛtyavasthānakathā /

S04bsu021_u:1431: tava tu bhagavan kāraṇamapi kāryāpekṣaṃ kāryamapi kāraṇāpekṣam /

S04bsu021_u:1437: ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātraṃ nāvabudhyante bāhyasvaviṣayabhāvābhāvatvena,

S04bsu021_u:1471: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nityaśabdaḥ punarbhagavan kvabhihitaḥ?
S04bsu021_u:1488: na hi mahāmate bhrāntirvividhavicitranimittavikalpena vikalpyamānā bhedamupayāti /

S04bsu021_u:1493: nānyatra mahāmate āryā asyāṃ bhrāntau yakiṃcitsaṃjñino bhavanti nāryajñānavastusaṃjñinaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:1495: sā punarbhrāntirviparyāsāviparyāsena vikalpyamānā gotradvayāvahā bhavati yaduta āryagotrasya vā bālapṛthagjanagotrasya vā /
S04bsu021_u:1497: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate bālairbhrāntirvikalpyamānā śrāvakayānagotraṃ janayati?

S04bsu021_u:1501: yaduta tasyā eva mahāmate bhrānteḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśāsaṃsargataḥ pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:1503: punarmahāmate paṇḍitaiḥ saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā buddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati?
S04bsu021_u:1512: ata etaduktaṃ bhavati mahāmate - tathatāpi cittavinirmukteti /

S04bsu021_u:1528: āryo na paśyati bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare /
S04bsu021_u:1530: bhrāntiṃ vidhūya sarvāṃ hi nimittaṃ jāyate yadi /

S04bsu021_u:1534: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:1536: tadyadi bhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:1540: na hi bhagavan kaściddheturasti yena rūpaṃ vicitralakṣaṇākāraṃ khyāyate māyāvat /

S04bsu021_u:1546: evameva mahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ svavikalpasāmānyalakṣaṇāḥ pravicayābhāvānna khyāyante rūpalakṣaṇābhiniveśataḥ //
S04bsu021_u:1550: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - anutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā māyopamāśceti /
S04bsu021_u:1551: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣaḥ prasajyate,
S04bsu021_u:1553: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate mamānutpādaṃ bhāvānāṃ māyopamatvenābhilapataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣo bhavati /

S04bsu021_u:1563: ete bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭilakṣaṇāśayābhiniviṣṭā ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca sarvadharmā yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanādvisaṃvādayiṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:1564: tatra yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanaṃ mahāmate sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraḥ //
S04bsu021_u:1569: yairnāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ sūpalakṣitairbodhisattvā mahāsattvā arthapadavyañjanānusāriṇaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya tathaiva sarvasattvānavabodhayiṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:1570: tatra mahāmate kāyo nāma yaduta yadvastvāśritya nāma kriyate,

S04bsu021_u:1584: nāma ca vyañjanaṃ ca punarmahāmate catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:1590: vyañjane padakāye ca nāmni cāpi viśeṣataḥ /

S04bsu021_u:1595: evamādyenottarottarakramalakṣaṇavidhinā avyākṛtāni pṛṣṭāḥ sthāpanīyaṃ bhagavatā avyākṛtamiti vakṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:1596: na tu te mohapuruṣā evaṃ jñāsyanti yathā śrotṝṇāṃ buddhivaikalyāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na vyākurvanti /
S04bsu021_u:1597: avyākṛtānyapi ca mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivādavyudāsārthaṃ nopadiśyante tathāgataiḥ /

S04bsu021_u:2440_1: samyaksaṃbuddhena ekasmin kāle ekasmin samaye yathā lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāno
S04bsu021_u:2440_2: na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2441: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti /
S04bsu021_u:2443: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgrahaḥ?
S04bsu021_u:2444: bhagavānāha - vicitramantrapratibhāno mahāmate lokāyatiko vicitrairhetupadavyañjanairbālān vyāmohayati na yuktiyuktaṃ nārthopasaṃhitam /
S04bsu021_u:2446: etena mahāmate kāraṇena lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāna ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:2455: tacchiṣyeṇa nāgaveśarūpadhāriṇā svarge indasabhāyāṃ pratijñāṃ kṛtvā tava vā sahasrāro ratho bhajyatāṃ mama vā ekaikanāgabhāvasya phaṇācchedo bhavatviti /
S04bsu021_u:2456: sahadharmeṇa ca nāgaveśadhāriṇā lokāyatikaśiṣyeṇa devānāmindraṃ vijitya sahasrāraṃ rathaṃ bhaṅktvā punarapīmaṃ lokamāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2457: evamidaṃ mahāmate lokāyatikavicitrahetudṛṣṭāntopanibaddhaṃ yena tiryañco 'pyadhītya devāsuralokaṃ vicitrapadavyañjanairvyāmohayati /
S04bsu021_u:2460: na sevitavyo na bhajitavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2461: śarīrabuddhiviṣayopalabdhimātraṃ hi mahāmate lokāyatikairdeśyate vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2463: kiṃ tu paścime loke paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ bhaviṣyati kutarkahetudṛṣṭipraṇītatvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2465: evadeva mahāmate lokāyataṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ vicitrahetūpanibaddhaṃ tīrthakarairdeśyate svakāraṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2469: na svanayaṃ ca na prajānanti mohohāllokāyatamidamiti //
S04bsu021_u:2470: mahāmatirāha - yadi bhagavan sarvatīrthakarā lokāyatameva vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairdṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśayanti,
S04bsu021_u:2472: atha kiṃ bhagavānapi lokāyatameva deśayati āgatāgatānāṃ nānādeśasaṃnipatitānāṃ devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2474: bhagavānāha - nāhaṃ mahāmate lokāyataṃ deśayāmi na cāyavyayam /
S04bsu021_u:2476: tatra āyo nāma mahāmate utpādarāśiḥ samūhāgamādutpadyate /
S04bsu021_u:2485: atha yenāhaṃ tena lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2486: upasaṃkramya akṛtāvakāśa eva māmevamāha - sarvaṃ bho gautama kṛtakam /
S04bsu021_u:2487: tasyāhaṃ mahāmate evamāha - sarvaṃ bho brāhmaṇa yadi kṛtakam,
S04bsu021_u:2492: evaṃ sarvamanityaṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ sarvamutpādyaṃ sarvamanutpādyam /
S04bsu021_u:2494: punarapi mahāmate māmevamāha brāhmaṇo lokāyatikaḥ - sarvaṃ bho gautama ekatvaṃ sarvamanyatvaṃ sarvamubhayatvaṃ sarvamanubhayatvaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇādhīnaṃ vicitrahetūipapattidarśanāt /
S04bsu021_u:2496: punarapi bho gautama sarvamavyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vyākṛtam,
S04bsu021_u:2499: asti paro loko nāsti paro lokaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2505: tasyaitaduktaṃ mahāmate mahā - yadi bho brāhmaṇa evam,
S04bsu021_u:2506: idamapi brāhmaṇa lokāyatameva bhavatīti, na madīyam /
S04bsu021_u:2511: ahaṃ bhe brāhmaṇa na hetuvādī nāhetuvādī anyatra vikalpameva grāhyagrāhakabhāvena prajñāpya pratītyasamutpādaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu021_u:2512: na ca tvādṛśā anye vā budhyante ātmagrāhapatitayā saṃtatyā /
S04bsu021_u:2515: punarapi mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa evamāha - ajñānatṛṣṇākarmahetukamidaṃ bho gautama tribhavam,
S04bsu021_u:2521: punaraparaṃ mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo māmetadavocat - asti bho gautama kiṃcidyanna lokāyatam?
S04bsu021_u:2522: madīyameva bho gautama sarvatīrthakaraiḥ prasiddhaṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairhetudṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśyate /
S04bsu021_u:2523: asti bho brāhmaṇa yanna tvadīyaṃ na ca na prasiddhaṃ deśyate na ca na vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairna ca nārthopasaṃhitameva /
S04bsu021_u:2524: kiṃ tadalokāyataṃ yanna prasiddhaṃ deśyate ca?
S04bsu021_u:2525: asti ca bho brāhmaṇa alokāyataṃ yatra sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ tava ca buddhirna gāhate bāhyabhāvādasadbhūtavikalpaprapañcābhiniviṣṭānām /
S04bsu021_u:2526: yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:2532_1: darśanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sthānaṃ parāmṛṣṭirvicitralakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ saṃgatiḥ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ
S04bsu021_u:2533: etadbho brāhmaṇa tvadīyaṃ lokāyataṃ na madīyam /
S04bsu021_u:2537: atha khalu kṛṣṇapakṣiko nāgarājo brāhmaṇarūpeṇāgatya bhagavantametadavocat - tena hi gautama paraloka eva na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu021_u:2541_0: atha māṇavo niṣpratibhāno nigṛhīto 'ntarhito 'pṛṣṭvaiva māṃ svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ
S04bsu021_u:2542: tvaṃ caitarhi mahāmate māṃ pṛcchasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ lokāyatikavicitramantrapratibhānaṃ sevyamānasyāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti /

S04bsu021_u:2551: yaduta āmiṣamāmṛśamākarṣaṇaṃ nirmṛṣaṃ parāmṛṣṭiḥ svādo bāhyaviṣayābhiniveśo 'ntadvayapraveśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2552: kudṛṣṭyā punaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsapravṛttistṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā ādiṃ kṛtvā /

S04bsu021_u:2574: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ hi dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:2583: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate /
S04bsu021_u:2589: na ca bhavati teṣāṃ vikalpānurupaṃ nirvāṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2590: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:2591: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tatra kecittāvanmahāmate tīrthakarāḥ skandhadhātvāyatananirodhādviṣayavairāgyānnivaidharmyādarśanāccittacaittakalāpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:2595: anye punardeśāntarasthānagamanaṃ mokṣa iti varṇayanti viṣayavikalpoparamādiṣu pavanavat /
S04bsu021_u:2598: anye punarvarṇayanti vividhanimittavikalpo duḥkhajanmavāhaka iti svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2603: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakarā durvidagdhabuddhayaḥ prakṛtipuruṣāntaradarśanādguṇapariṇāmakartṛtvācca nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2607: anye anyonyapravṛtto 'yaṃ saṃbhavo jagata iti na kāraṇataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2613: anye svabhāvataḥ pravṛttito mayūravaicitryavividharatnākarakaṇṭakataikṣṇyavadbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2624: evamanyānyapi yāni tārkikaiḥ kutīrthyapraṇītāni tānyayuktiyuktāni vidvadbhiḥ parivarjitāni /
S04bsu021_u:2625: sarve 'pyete mahāmate antadvayapatitayā saṃtatyā nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2627: na cātra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā /
S04bsu021_u:2632: atra tvayā mahāmate śikṣitvā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatīrthakaranirvāṇadṛṣṭirvyāvartanīyā //
S04bsu021_u:2637: tīrthyā mokṣaṃ vikalpenti na ca mokṣo hi vidyate // Lank_3.70 //
S04bsu021_u:2642: jalpaprapañcābhiratā hi bālāstattve na kurvanti matiṃ viśālām /

S04bsu021_u:2644: yathā hi darpaṇe rūpaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:2645: vāsanādarpaṇe cittaṃ dvidhā dṛśyati bāliśaiḥ // Lank_3.74 //
S04bsu021_u:2650: dṛśyākāraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_3.76 //

S04bsu021_u:2655: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svabuddhabuddhatām,
S04bsu021_u:2656: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatasvakuśalāḥ svamātmānaṃ parāṃścāvabodhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2657: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate tvameva paripṛccha /
S04bsu021_u:2660: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'kṛtakaḥ kṛtakaḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇamabhidhānamabhidheyaṃ buddhirboddhavyaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2662: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evamādyaiḥ padaniruktairakṛtako na kṛtakaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2665: yadi hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ kṛtakaḥ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:2668: aniṣṭaṃ caitanmama ca anyeṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām /
S04bsu021_u:2672: yacca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tanna sannāsat /
S04bsu021_u:2677: vandhyāputro hi mahāmate vāgmātraṃ na cātuṣkoṭikapatitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2683: svātmanā sarvadharmā vidyante na parātmanā gośvavat /
S04bsu021_u:2684: tadyathā mahāmate na gobhāvo 'śvātmako na cāśvabhāvo gavātmakaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2688: evameva mahāmate sarvadharmā na ca svalakṣaṇena na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu021_u:2715_0: yaddhi mahāmate na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ
S04bsu021_u:2715_1: na buddhirna boddhavyaṃ na lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ na skandhā na skandhebhyo 'nyat nābhidheyaṃ
S04bsu021_u:2721: ākāśaṃ ca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2722: yacca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tannirālambyam /
S04bsu021_u:2730: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2731: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkenacitkathaṃ tasya vibhāvanā // Lank_3.80 //
S04bsu021_u:2732: na kṛtako nākṛtako na kāryaṃ nāpi kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2733: na ca skandhā na cāskandhā na cāpyanyatra saṃkarāt // Lank_3.81 //
S04bsu021_u:2734: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:2735: na taṃ nāstyeva gantavyaṃ dharmāṇāmeva dharmatā // Lank_3.82 //
S04bsu021_u:2737: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet // Lank_3.83 //
S04bsu021_u:2741: tadā samyakprapaśyanti na te dūṣenti nāyakān // Lank_3.85 //

S04bsu021_u:2768: ityevamādyānāṃ bhāvānāmekaikasya bhāvasya bahavaḥ paryāyavācakāḥ śabdā bhavanti vikalpitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2771: evaṃ mahāmate ahamapi sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairbālānāṃ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgacchāmi /

S04bsu021_u:2776_0: nāyakaṃ vināyakaṃ pariṇāyakaṃ buddhamṛṣiṃ vṛṣabhaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viṣṇumīśvaraṃ pradhānaṃ
S04bsu021_u:2776_1: kapilaṃ bhūtāntamariṣṭaneminaṃ somaṃ bhāskaraṃ rāmaṃ vyāsaṃ śukamindraṃ baliṃ varuṇamiti caike saṃjānanti /
S04bsu021_u:2778_0: śūnyatāṃ tathatāṃ satyatāṃ bhūtatāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ dharmadhātuṃ nirvāṇaṃ nityaṃ samatāmadvayamanirodhamanimittaṃ
S04bsu021_u:2778_1: pratyayaṃ buddhahetūpadeśaṃ vimokṣaṃ mārgasatyāni sarvajñaṃ jinaṃ manomayamiti caike saṃjānanti /
S04bsu021_u:2779: evamādibhirmahāmate paripūrṇaṃ tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairanūnairanadhikairihānyeṣu ca lokadhātuṣu māṃ janāḥ saṃjānante udakacandra ivāpraviṣṭanirgatam /

S04bsu021_u:2785: evaṃ ca mahāmate vakṣyanti te mohapuruṣāḥ - yathāruta evārthaḥ,

S04bsu021_u:2795: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā akṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2797: anyatra akṣarapatitāśayaḥ punarmahāmate yo 'kṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu021_u:2800: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate uktaṃ deśanāpāṭhe mayā anyaiśca buddhabodhisattvaiḥ yathaikamapyakṣaraṃ tathāgatā nodāharanti na pratyāharantīti /
S04bsu021_u:2808: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena deśanāpāṭharutānabhiniviṣṭena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:2811: sattvāśayapravṛttatvānnānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā kriyate cittamanomanovijñānavyāvṛttyarthaṃ mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2813: arthapratiśaraṇena mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśaraṇena /
S04bsu021_u:2814: vyañjanānusārī mahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svātmānaṃ ca nāśayati,
S04bsu021_u:2816: kudṛṣṭipatitayā saṃtatyā svapakṣaṃ vibhrāmyate kutīrthakaiḥ sarvadharmabhūmisvalakṣaṇākuśalaiḥ padaniruktyanabhijñaiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:2820: mahāyāne ca mahāmate samyakparigṛhyamāṇe buddhaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ parigrahaḥ kṛto bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:2825_0: atasteṣu viśiṣṭāyatanapratilambheṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upapattiṃ parigṛhya mahāyāne
S04bsu021_u:2828: tena na mahāmate kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā yathārutārthābhiniveśakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:2833: evameva mahāmate bālajātīyā iva bālapṛthagjanavargā yathārutāṅgulyagrābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā eva kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
S04bsu021_u:2835: tadyathā mahāmate annaṃ bhojyaṃ bālānāṃ ca kaścidanabhisaṃskṛtaṃ paribhoktum /
S04bsu021_u:2841: ata etena kāraṇena mahāmate arthābhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2846: bāhuśrutyaṃ ca nāma mahāmate yaduta arthakauśalyaṃ na rutakauśalyam /
S04bsu021_u:2848: yathā svayaṃ ca na patati parāṃśca na pātayati /
S04bsu021_u:2852: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirbuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhita evamāha - na bhagavatā anirodhānutpādadarśanena kiṃcidviśiṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:2856: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇapratyayahetukīṃ jagata utpattiṃ varṇayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2866: yāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā bhūto bhūtasvabhāvaṃ na vijahāti /
S04bsu021_u:2869: viśeṣo vātra vaktavyo yena tathāgatavādo viśeṣyate,
S04bsu021_u:2871: aviśiṣyamāṇe bhagavan svavāde tīrthakarāṇāmapi buddhaprasaṅgaḥ syādanirodhānutpādahetutvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2872: asthānamanavakāśaṃ coktaṃ bhagavatā yadekatra lokadhātau bahavastathāgatā utpadyeranniti /
S04bsu021_u:2874: bhagavānāha - na mama mahāmate anirodhānutpādastīrthakarānutpādānirodhavādena tulyo nāpyutpādānityavādena /
S04bsu021_u:2876: tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvo vidyata evānutpannāvikaralakṣaṇaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2878: mama tu mahāmate sadasatpakṣavigata utpādabhaṅgavirahito na bhāvo nābhāavaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2886: tadyathā mahāmate kaścidgandharvanagare bālajātīyo māyāpuruṣasattvasārthavaicitryaṃ praviaśantaṃ vā nirgacchantaṃ vā kalpayet - amī praviṣṭā amī nirgatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2887: na ca tatra kaścitpraviṣṭo vā nirgato vā /
S04bsu021_u:2891: na ca māyāpuruṣa utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā bhāvābhāvākiṃcitkaratvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2893: anyatra vitathapatitayā saṃjñayā bālā utpādanirodhaṃ kalpayanti na tvāryāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2894: tatra vitathamiti mahāmate na tathā yathā bhāvasvabhāvaḥ kalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:2898: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate animittadarśanameva śreyo na nimittadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:2901: tatra nirvāṇamiti mahāmate yathābhūtārthasthānadarśanaṃ vikalpacittacaittakalāpasya parāvṛttipūrvakam /
S04bsu021_u:2905: ahetuvādaṃ deśemi na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_3.86 //
S04bsu021_u:2906: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca /
S04bsu021_u:2916: anutpāde prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati /
S04bsu021_u:2917: ahetuvāde deśyante tīrthyānāṃ jāyate bhayam // Lank_3.91 //
S04bsu021_u:2918: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:2919: nāhetuko na hetubhyo yadā paśyanti saṃskṛtam /
S04bsu021_u:2922: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me // Lank_3.93 //
S04bsu021_u:2923: na cābhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayavīkṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2924: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam // Lank_3.94 //
S04bsu021_u:2938: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā // Lank_3.100 //
S04bsu021_u:2940: kalāpācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate // Lank_3.101 //
S04bsu021_u:2941: bhāvo na vidyate 'nyo 'nyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2944: anyatra hi kalāpo 'yaṃ pravartate nivartate // Lank_3.103 //
S04bsu021_u:2948: deśemi saṃkalāmātraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_3.105 //
S04bsu021_u:2949: yasya janyo bhavedbhāvaḥ saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2952: yasya bhāvo bhavetkaścitsaṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit // Lank_3.107 //
S04bsu021_u:2954: saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthagbhūtā ye dharmāḥ kalpitābudhaiḥ // Lank_3.108 //
S04bsu021_u:2956: yasya jātinamutpādaṃ tadanutpāde kṣāntiḥ syāt // Lank_3.109 //
S04bsu021_u:2962: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2963: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ // Lank_3.112 //
S04bsu021_u:2964: yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
S04bsu021_u:2965: anyonyajanakā hyete tenaite pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // Lank_3.113 //
S04bsu021_u:2967: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā // Lank_3.114 //
S04bsu021_u:2969: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedāttu bhidyate // Lank_3.115 //
S04bsu021_u:2971: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi prāṇinām // Lank_3.116 //
S04bsu021_u:2974: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - anityatā anityateti bhagavan sarvatīrthakarairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:2975: tvayā ca sarvadeśanāpāṭhe deśyate - anityā bata saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇa iti /
S04bsu021_u:2978: bhagavānāha - aṣṭaprakārā hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarairanityatā kalpyate, na tu mayā /
S04bsu021_u:2985: nairantaryaprabandhena svarasabhaṅgabhedaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣīradadhipariṇāmavikārāntaravadadṛṣṭanaṣṭā sarvabhāveṣu pravartate na nityateti /
S04bsu021_u:2990: tatra anutpādānityatā nāma yaduta nityamanityaṃ sadasatorapravṛttiḥ sarvadharmāṇāmadarśanaṃ paramāṇupravicayādadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:2992: etaddhi mahāmate anutpādānityatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasyānavabodhātsarvatīrthakarā utpādānityatāvāde prapatanti //
S04bsu021_u:3001: na ca kāryakāraṇayorviśeṣo 'sti iyamanityatā idaṃ kāryamiti /
S04bsu021_u:3005: na ca kāraṇaṃ visadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ janayati /
S04bsu021_u:3014: anityatvādayaḥ sarvabhāvā nityāḥ syurnityā eva bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3017: tatra yadatītaṃ rūpaṃ tattena saha vinaṣṭam /
S04bsu021_u:3022: sarvatīrthakarāṇāmavināśātsarvabhūtānāṃ sarvaṃ tribhavaṃ bhūtabhautikaṃ yatrotpādasthitivikāraḥ prajñapyate /
S04bsu021_u:3024: bhūtāni ca na pravartante na nivartante svabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniveśāt //
S04bsu021_u:3025: tatra prārambhavinivṛttirnāma anityatā - na punarbhūtāni bhūtāntaramārabhante parasparavilakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇānna viśeṣaḥ prārabhyate /
S04bsu021_u:3027: tatra saṃsthānavinivṛttirnāma anityatā - yaduta na bhūtabhautikaṃ vinaśyati ā pralayāt /
S04bsu021_u:3028: pralayo nāma mahāmate ā paramāṇoḥ pravicayaparīkṣā vināśo bhūtabhautikasya saṃsthānasyānyathābhūtadarśanāddīrghahrasvānulabdhiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3030: tatra saṃsthānānityatā nāma - yaduta yasya rūpamevānityaṃ tasya saṃsthānasyānityatā na bhūtānām /
S04bsu021_u:3036: tatra vikārānityatā nāma - yaduta rūpasyānyathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhūtānāṃ suvarṇasaṃsthānabhūṣaṇavikāradarśanavat /
S04bsu021_u:3037: na suvarṇaṃ bhāvādvinaśyati kiṃ tu bhūṣaṇasaṃsthānavināśo bhavati //
S04bsu021_u:3042: mama tu mahāmate na nityā nānityā /
S04bsu021_u:3050: trividhaṃ ca mahāmate sarvatīrthakaralauikikalokottaratamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vāgvikalpaviniḥsṛtānām /
S04bsu021_u:3054: bhāvamanityatāṃ rūpaṃ tīrthyāḥ kalpenti mohitāḥ // Lank_3.118 //
S04bsu021_u:3055: bhāvānāṃ nāsti vai nāśaṃ bhūtā bhūtātmanā sthitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3057: kasyacinna hi tīrthyasya vināśo na ca saṃbhavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3058: bhūtā bhūtātmanā nityāḥ kasya kalpentyanityatām // Lank_3.120 //
S04bsu021_u:3068_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu
S04bsu021_u:3068_2: yena kramānusaṃdhilakṣaṇakauśalyena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nirodhasukhasamāpattimukhena na pratimuhyema,
S04bsu021_u:3073: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
S04bsu021_u:3074: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - ṣaṣṭhīṃ mahāmate bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāśca nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
S04bsu021_u:3075: saptamyāṃ bhūmau punaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyudāsātsamāpadyante,
S04bsu021_u:3077: teṣāṃ hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmābhisaṃskārikī grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇapatitā ca nirodhasamāpattiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3078: ataste saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadyante - mā sarvadharmāṇāmaviśeṣalakṣaṇaprāptiḥ syāditi /
S04bsu021_u:3081: ataḥ saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpattikauśalyaṃ nāsti yena samāpadyeran //
S04bsu021_u:3082: aṣṭamyāṃ mahāmate bhūmau bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvyāvṛttirbhavati /
S04bsu021_u:3083: prathamaṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau cittamanomanovijñānamātraṃ traidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati ātmātmīyavigataṃ svacittavikalpodbhavam,
S04bsu021_u:3085: dvidhā bālānāṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvena pariṇāmya svajñānaṃ na cāvabodhyante anādikāladauṣṭhulyavikalpaprapañcavāsanāvāsitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3092: acintyabuddhamāhātmyaṃ ca deśayanti te buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3096_2: kriyate mayā - mā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇānavabodhādbhūmikramānusaṃdhyakuśalāstīrthakarakudṛṣṭimārge prapateyuḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3098: na tu mahāmate atra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā anyatra svacitadṛśyamātramidaṃ yaduta bhūmikramānusaṃdhistraidhātukavicitropacāraśca /
S04bsu021_u:3100: anavabodhādbālānāṃ bhūmikramānusaṃdhivyapadeśaṃ traidhātukavicitropacāraśca vyavasthāpyate buddhadharmālayā ca //
S04bsu021_u:3102_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau nirodhasamāpattisukhamadamattāḥ
S04bsu021_u:3104: bodhisattvāḥ punarmahāmate nirodhasamādhisukhamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvapraṇidhānakṛpākaruṇopetā niṣṭhapadagativibhāgajñā na parinirvānti /
S04bsu021_u:3111: tadyathā punarmahāmate kaścicchayitaḥ svapnāntare mahāvyāyāmautsukyena mahaughādātmānamuttārayet /
S04bsu021_u:3114_0: sa evaṃ samanupaśyet - nedaṃ satyaṃ na mithyā anyatra dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānubhūtavikalpavāsanāvicitrarūpasaṃsthānānādikālavikalpapatitā
S04bsu021_u:3115_0: evameva mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ
S04bsu021_u:3116: anadhigatānāmadhigamāya prayoga eṣa mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ na vināśaḥ cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvigamācca anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:3117: na cātra mahāmate paramārthe kramo na kramānusaṃdhirnirābhāsavikalpaviviktadharmopadeśāt //
S04bsu021_u:3120: etaddhi bhāṣitaṃ buddhairbhāṣante bhāṣayanti ca // Lank_4.1 //
S04bsu021_u:3121: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā tvihāṣṭamī /
S04bsu021_u:3122: dve hi bhūmī vihāro 'tra śeṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_4.2 //
S04bsu021_u:3126: citrā manoharāḥ saumyāstribhavaṃ nirmiṇanti te // Lank_4.4 //
S04bsu021_u:3128: tatra deśemi yānāni eṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_4.5 //
S04bsu021_u:3129: daśamī tu bhavetprathamā prathamā cāṣṭamī bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:3130: navamī saptamī cāpi saptamī cāṣṭamī bhavet // Lank_4.6 //
S04bsu021_u:3131: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā syāccaturthī pañcamī bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:3132: tṛtīyā ca bhavetṣaṣṭhī nirābhāse kramaḥ kutaḥ // Lank_4.7 //
S04bsu021_u:3138: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ bhagavaṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nitya utāho 'nityaḥ?
S04bsu021_u:3139: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato nityo nānityaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3144: nityāni hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇānyakṛtakāni ca /
S04bsu021_u:3155: tadyathā mahāmate ākāśaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ nityānityavyudāsādekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvanityānityatvadoṣairavacanīyaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3158: punaraparaṃ mahāmate astyasau paryāyo yena nityastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3161: abhisamayādhigamajñānaṃ hi mahāmate nityaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
S04bsu021_u:3162: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmaniyāmatā dharmasthititā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthakarābhisamayeṣu /
S04bsu021_u:3169: dvaye hi sati mahāmate nityatā cānityatā ca bhavati, nādvayāt /
S04bsu021_u:3171: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā na nityā nānityāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3174: vikalpabuddhikṣayānmahāmate nityānityagrāho nivāryate bālānāṃ na tu viviktadṛṣṭibuddhikṣayāt //
S04bsu021_u:3177: ye paśyanti sadā buddhān na te dṛṣṭivaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_5.1 //
S04bsu021_u:3182: svacittamātraṃ saṃpaśyan na vivādaṃ samārabhet // Lank_5.3 //
S04bsu021_u:3188: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:3195: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
S04bsu021_u:3196: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tathāgatagarbho mahāmate kuśalākuśalahetukaḥ sarvajanmagatikartā pravartate naṭavadgatisaṃkaṭa ātmātmīyavarjitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3203: aparāvṛtte ca tathāgatagarbhaśabdasaṃśabdite ālayavijñāne nāsti saptānāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ nirodhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3209: tato 'calāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito daśasamādhisukhamukhamārgān pratilabhate /
S04bsu021_u:3212: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhaḥ ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito viśodhayitavyo viśeṣārthibhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3213: yadi hi mahāmate ālayavijñānasaṃśabditastathāgatagarbho 'tra na syāditi asati mahāmate tathāgatagarbhe ālayavijñānasaṃśabdite na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ syāt /
S04bsu021_u:3217: prakṛtipariśuddho 'pi san aśuddha ivāgantukleśopakliṣṭatayā teṣāmābhāti na tu tathāgatānām /
S04bsu021_u:3219_0: etadeva mahāmate mayā śrīmālāṃ devīmadhikṛtya deśanāpāṭhe anyāṃśca sūkṣmanipuṇaviśuddhabuddhīn
S04bsu021_u:3219_2: saha pravṛttyabhiniviṣṭānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmanairātmyapradarśanārthaṃ śrīmālāṃ devīmadhiṣṭhāya
S04bsu021_u:3219_4: tathāgataviṣaya eva tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānaviṣayastvatsadṛśānāṃ ca sūkṣmanipuṇamatibuddhiprabhedakānāṃ
S04bsu021_u:3220: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatathāgataviṣaye 'smiṃstathāgatagarbhālayavijñānaparijñāne yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3226: arthākāro na cārtho 'sti yathābhūtaṃ vipaśyataḥ // Lank_6.2 //
S04bsu021_u:3227: aṅgulyagraṃ yathā bālo na gṛhṇāti niśākaram /
S04bsu021_u:3228: tathā hyakṣarasaṃsaktastattvaṃ vetti na māmakam // Lank_6.3 //
S04bsu021_u:3230: vijñānaṃ pañcabhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛśyaṃ kalpeti raṅgavat // Lank_6.4 //
S04bsu021_u:3231: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:3233: yena nairātmyadvayaprabhedagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhūmikramānusaṃdhiṣvetān dharmān vibhāvayema,
S04bsu021_u:3239: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:3241_0: yaduta nāma nimittaṃ vikalpaḥ samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca tathāgatapratyātmāryagatipraveśaḥ
S04bsu021_u:3242: tatra mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyadvayasvacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvābhāvānavabodhādvikalpaḥ pravartate bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām //

S04bsu021_u:3579_2: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayogasādhanāntarāyakaramityapi samanupaśyatāṃ mahāmate
S04bsu021_u:3581: devatā api cainaṃ parivarjayantīti kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /

S04bsu021_u:3597: na ca mahāmate anāgate 'dhvani ekeṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ vividhavinayavikalpavādināṃ kravyādakulavāsitāvāsitānāṃ rasatṛṣṇāvyavasitānāmidaṃ praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ pratibhāṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:3600: sa māṃsabhojanāhārātiprasaṅgena pratisevamāno rasatṛṣṇādhyavasānaparamatayā māṃsāni mānuṣyāṇyapi bhakṣitavān /
S04bsu021_u:3607: yasmādrājā anaparādhibhūtānukampakaḥ śibī duḥkhena mahatā lambhitaḥ /

S04bsu021_u:3610_0: anyeṣāṃ ca mahāmate narendrabhūtānāṃ satāmaśvenāpahṛtānāmaṭavyāṃ paryaṭamānānāṃ siṃhyā
S04bsu021_u:3610_1: saha maithunaṃ gatavatāṃ jīvitabhayādapatyāni cotpāditavantaḥ siṃhasaṃvāsānvayātkalmāṣapādaprabhṛtayo
S04bsu021_u:3610_2: nṛpaputrāḥ pūrvajanmamāṃsādadoṣavāsanatayā manuṣyendrabhūtā api santo māṃsādā abhūvan /
S04bsu021_u:3611: ihaiva ca mahāmate janmani saptakuṭīrake 'pi grāme pracuramāṃsalaulyādatiprasaṅgena niṣevamānā mānuṣamāṃsādā ghorā ḍākā vā ḍākinyaśca saṃjāyante /
S04bsu021_u:3615: ityevamādayo mahāmate māṃsādadoṣāḥ prāgeva niṣevamānānāṃ samupajāyante,
S04bsu021_u:3619: evamādiguṇadoṣadarśanānmahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyeti vadāmi //
S04bsu021_u:3620: yadi ca mahāmate māṃsaṃ na kathaṃcana kecana bhakṣayeyuḥ,

S04bsu021_u:3623: kaṣṭaṃ mahāmate rasatṛṣṇāyāmatisevatāṃ māṃsāni mānuṣānyapi mānuṣairbhakṣyante,
S04bsu021_u:3625: prāyo mahāmate māṃsarasatṛṣṇārtairidaṃ tathā tathā jālayantramāviddhaṃ mohapuruṣaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3627: na caiṣāṃ mahāmate kiṃkanīkṛtarūkṣacetasāṃ rākṣasānāmiva gataghṛṇānāṃ kadācidapi prāṇiṣu prāṇisaṃjñayā ghātayatāṃ bhakṣayatāṃ na ghṛṇotpadyate //
S04bsu021_u:3628: na ca mahāmate akṛtakamakāritamasaṃkalpitaṃ nāma māṃsaṃ kalpyamasti yadupādāya anujānīyāṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3629_0: bhaviṣyanti tu punarmahāmate anāgate 'dhvani mamaiva śāsane pravrajitvā śākyaputrīyatvaṃ
S04bsu021_u:3637: yadi tu mahāmate anujñātukāmatā me syāt,
S04bsu021_u:3638: kalpyaṃ vā me śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisevituṃ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:3639_0: nāhaṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S04bsu021_u:3641_0: asmin mahāmate dharmakāmānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
S04bsu021_u:3641_1: śmaśānikānāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāmāraṇyakānāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ sarvayogasādhanāya sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ
S04bsu021_u:3642: tatra tatra deśanāpāṭhe śikṣāpadānāmanupūrvībandhaṃ niḥśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena trikoṭiṃ baddhvā na taduddiśya kṛtāni pratiṣiddhāni /
S04bsu021_u:3644: iha tu sūtre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nirupāyena sarvaṃ pratiṣiddham /
S04bsu021_u:3649: yadapi ca mahāmate mamābhyākhyānaṃ dātavyaṃ maṃsyante tathāgatenāpi paribhuktamiti,
S04bsu021_u:3650: tadanyeṣāṃ mahāmate mohapuruṣāṇāṃ svakarmadoṣāvaraṇāvṛtānāṃ dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya saṃvartakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu021_u:3653: dharmāhārā hi mahāmate mama śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāśca nāmiṣāhārāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3655_0: dharmakāyā hi mahāmate tathāgatā dharmāhārasthitayo nāmiṣakāyā na sarvāmiṣāhārasthitayo
S04bsu021_u:3656: so 'haṃ mahāmate sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñī san kathamiva svaputramāṃsamanujñāsyāmi paribhoktuṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3658: anujñātavānasmi śrāvakebhyaḥ svayaṃ vā paribhuktavāniti mahāmate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:3660: madyaṃ māṃsaṃ palāṇḍuṃ na bhakṣayeyaṃ mahāmune /

S04bsu021_u:3675: mūḍhasya saṃgatirbhavati jāyate na ca mucyate // Lank_8.8 //

S04bsu021_u:3677: ubhau tau pāpakarmāṇau pacyete rauravādiṣu // Lank_8.9 //
S04bsu021_u:3680: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakarmiṇaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3684: acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmānmāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet // Lank_8.12 //
S04bsu021_u:3685: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayedyogī mayā buddhaiśca garhitam /
S04bsu021_u:3688: caṇḍālapukkasakule ḍombeṣu ca punaḥ punaḥ // Lank_8.14 //
S04bsu021_u:3692: laṅkāvatārasūtre ca mayā māṃsaṃ vivarjitam // Lank_8.16 //
S04bsu021_u:3694: khādate yadi nairlajjyādunmatto jāyate sadā // Lank_8.17 //
S04bsu021_u:3695: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyeta atha vā yogināṃ kule /
S04bsu021_u:3702: kalpikaṃ niravadyaṃ ca māṃsaṃ buddhānuvarṇitam // Lank_8.21 //
S04bsu021_u:3704: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret // Lank_8.22 //
S04bsu021_u:3714: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - udgṛhṇa tvaṃ mahāmate laṅkāvatāre mantrapadāni yānyatītānāgatapratyutpannairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbhāṣitāni,
S04bsu021_u:3755: yaḥ kaścinmahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāni mantrapadānyudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S04bsu021_u:3756_0: na tasya kaścidavatāraṃ lapsyate devo vā devī vā nāgo vā nāgī vā yakṣo vā yakṣī vā
S04bsu021_u:3756_1: asuro vā asurī vā garuḍo vā garuḍī vā kinnaro vā kinnarī vā mahorago vā mahoragī
S04bsu021_u:3756_2: vā gandharvo vā gandharvī vā bhūto vā bhūtī vā kumbhāṇḍo vā kumbhāṇḍī vā piśāco vā
S04bsu021_u:3756_3: piśācī vā ostārako vā austārakī vā apasmāro vā apasmārī vā rākṣaso vā rākṣasī vā
S04bsu021_u:3756_4: ḍāko vā ḍākinī vā ojohāro vā ojohārī vā kaṭapūtano vā kaṭapūtanī vā amanuṣyo vā amanuṣyī vā,
S04bsu021_u:3759: so 'syāṣṭottaraśatābhimantritena rodan krandanto kaṃ diśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāsyati //
S04bsu021_u:3769: chinde bhinde bhañje marde pramarde dinakare svāhā //
S04bsu021_u:3770: imāni mahāmate mantrapadāni yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S04bsu021_u:3771_0: tasya na kaścidavatāraṃ lapsyate devo vā devī vā nāgo vā nāgī vā yakṣo vā yakṣī vā
S04bsu021_u:3771_1: asuro vā asurī vā garuḍo vā garuḍī vā kinnaro vā kinnarī vā mahorago vā mahoragī
S04bsu021_u:3771_2: vā gandharvo vā gandharvī vā bhūto vā bhūtī vā kumbhāṇḍo vā kumbhāṇḍī vā piśāco vā

S04bsu021_u:3795: viśuddhamanimittena prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.4 //

S04bsu021_u:3805: kalpanāmātramevedaṃ yo budhyati sa mucyati // Lank_10.9 //
S04bsu021_u:3807: sāpyatra manyanā śūnyā yayā śūnyeti manyate // Lank_10.10 //
S04bsu021_u:3809: māyāsvapnopamaṃ dṛśyaṃ vijñaptyā na vikalpayet // Lank_10.11 //
S04bsu021_u:3813: aṣṭaghā navadhā citraṃ taraṃgāṇi mahodadhau // Lank_10.13 //
S04bsu021_u:3821: parāvṛttaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā tiṣṭhati śāśvatam /
S04bsu021_u:3826: bālā gṛhṇanti dhiṅbhūḍhā vandhyāḥ svapne yathā sutam // Lank_10.19 //
S04bsu021_u:3828: pratyayā dhātavo jñeyā śūnyatā ca bhavābhavam // Lank_10.20 //
S04bsu021_u:3830: bālā gṛhṇanti bhāvena lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyameva ca // Lank_10.21 //
S04bsu021_u:3831: sarvasya vettā na ca sarvavettā sarvasya madhye na ca sarvamasti /
S04bsu021_u:3832: bālā vikalpenti budhaśca loko na cāpi budhyāmi na ca bodhayāmi // Lank_10.22 //
S04bsu021_u:3837: tadā grāhaśca grāhyaṃ ca bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate // Lank_10.24 //
S04bsu021_u:3838: nāhaṃ nirvāmi bhāvena kriyayā lakṣaṇena ca /
S04bsu021_u:3842: tathā vijñānavaicitryaṃ niruddhaṃ na pravartate // Lank_10.26 //
S04bsu021_u:3845: sadasanto na vidyante bhāvāḥ svapnopamā ime // Lank_10.27 //
S04bsu021_u:3848: khadyotā iva mattasya yathā citrā na santi ca /
S04bsu021_u:3851: na cāsau vidyate māyā evaṃ dharmāḥ svabhāvataḥ // Lank_10.30 //
S04bsu021_u:3852: na grāhako na ca grāhyaṃ na bandhyo na ca bandhanam /
S04bsu021_u:3855: tadā yogaṃ samāpanno drakṣyate māṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Lank_10.32 //
S04bsu021_u:3857: evaṃ dharmān vijānanto na kiṃcitpratijānati // Lank_10.33 //
S04bsu021_u:3859: bhrāntaṃ traidhātuke cittaṃ vicitraṃ khyāyate yataḥ // Lank_10.34 //
S04bsu021_u:3860: svapnaṃ ca lokaṃ ca samasvabhāvaṃ rūpāṇi citrāṇi hi tatra cāpi /
S04bsu021_u:3861: dṛśyanti bhogaṃ spariśaṃ samānaṃ dehāntagaṃ lokaguruṃ kriyāṃ ca // Lank_10.35 //
S04bsu021_u:3862: cittaṃ hi traidhātukayoniretadbhrāntaṃ hi cittamihamutra dṛśyate /

S04bsu021_u:3865: na saṃbhavaṃ na vibhavaṃ prajñāyukto vipaśyati // Lank_10.37 //
S04bsu021_u:3869: tatra budhyanti saṃbuddhā nirmitastviha budhyate // Lank_10.39 //
S04bsu021_u:3872: sarvatra bālāḥ śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ tebhyaḥ pratiśrutvā (?) // Lank_10.40 //
S04bsu021_u:3876: bhrānteśca vidyate māyā na māyā bhrāntikāraṇam // Lank_10.42 //
S04bsu021_u:3879: lokaṃ vijñaptimātraṃ ca dṛṣṭyaughaṃ dharmapudgalam // Lank_10.43 //
S04bsu021_u:3880: vibhāvya lokamevaṃ tu parāvṛtto yadā bhavet /

S04bsu021_u:3885: rūpaṃ kalpanti vai bālā bhrāntāḥ saṃsārapañjare // Lank_10.46 //
S04bsu021_u:3892: khyātau kalpanti utpattiṃ bālāḥ kalpadvaye ratāḥ // Lank_10.49 //
S04bsu021_u:3893: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karmaṃ ca cittacaittā na mārakam /
S04bsu021_u:3894: pravartati tato yasmātpāratantryaṃ hi tanmatam // Lank_10.50 //
S04bsu021_u:3898: pratyayebhyo vinirmuktaṃ na paśyāmi vadāmyaham // Lank_10.52 //
S04bsu021_u:3900: na tiṣṭhati yadā dehe tena mahyamagocaram // Lank_10.53 //
S04bsu021_u:3903: pralobhya krīḍati gṛhe vane mṛgasamāgamam // Lank_10.54 //
S04bsu021_u:3905: pratyātmavedyāṃ hi sutāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.55 //
S04bsu021_u:3907: nṛtyamānāḥ pravartante vyucchedaścaḥ na vidyate // Lank_10.56 //
S04bsu021_u:3911: dṛśyasya lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_10.58 //
S04bsu021_u:3914: nāsti skandheṣvātmā na sattvo na ca pudgalaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3915: utpadyate ca vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ ca nirudhyate // Lank_10.60 //
S04bsu021_u:3916: nimnonnataṃ yathā citre dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:3917: tathā bhāveṣu bhāvatvaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate // Lank_10.61 //
S04bsu021_u:3919: dṛśyaṃ khyāti tathā nityaṃ prajñayā ca na vidyate // Lank_10.62 //
S04bsu021_u:3922: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit /
S04bsu021_u:3923: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkena kutastasya vibhāvanā // Lank_10.64 //
S04bsu021_u:3927: svapnavibhramamāyākhyaṃ śūnyaṃ vai kalpitaṃ jagat // Lank_10.66 //
S04bsu021_u:3929: anutpannaṃ bhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣāntyanutpatti jāyate // Lank_10.67 //

S04bsu021_u:3932: bhāvā yeṣāṃ hyanutpannāḥ śūnyā vai asvabhāvakāḥ /

S04bsu021_u:3936: anyanna vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_10.70 //
S04bsu021_u:3937: saṃkalā buddhabimbaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca vidāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:3938: adhiṣṭhanti jagaccitraṃ prajñaptyā vai suśikṣitāḥ // Lank_10.71 //
S04bsu021_u:3943: naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ hi bhāvānāṃ yadā budhyanti prajñayā /

S04bsu021_u:3987: tadā yogī hyanābhāsaṃ prajñayā paśyate jagat /

S04bsu021_u:3993: bhrāntiṃ kalpenti utpannāṃ bālāṃ kalpadvaye ratāḥ // Lank_10.96 //
