S04bsu021_u:4002: cittasya dharmatā śuddhā gagane nāsti vāsanā // Lank_10.100 //
S04bsu021_u:4004: bahirdhā nāsti vai dṛśyamato vai cittamātrakam // Lank_10.101 //
S04bsu021_u:4006: gṛhṇāti viṣayān yena vijñānaṃ hi taducyate // Lank_10.102 //
S04bsu021_u:4008: vartamānaṃ hi vijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ hi tat // Lank_10.103 //
S04bsu021_u:4012: etaddhi bhāṣitaṃ buddhairbhāṣante bhāṣayanti ca // Lank_10.105 //
S04bsu021_u:4013: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā ca aṣṭamī /
S04bsu021_u:4014: dve bhūmayo vihāraśca śeṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_10.106 //
S04bsu021_u:4018: citrā manoharāḥ saumyāstribhavaṃ nirmiṇanti ye // Lank_10.108 //
S04bsu021_u:4020: tatra deśanti yānāni eṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_10.109 //
S04bsu021_u:4023: asattā caiva sattā ca dṛśyate ca vicitratā /
S04bsu021_u:4024: bālā grāhaviparyastā viparyāso hi citratā // Lank_10.111 //
S04bsu021_u:4025: nirvikalpaṃ yadi jñānaṃ vastvastīti na yujyate /
S04bsu021_u:4026: yasmāccittaṃ na rūpāṇi nirvikalpaṃ hi tena tat // Lank_10.112 //
S04bsu021_u:4028: kartā karma kriyā caiva sarvathāpi na vidyate // Lank_10.113 //
S04bsu021_u:4037: anutpattiṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikārthaṃ vadāmyahyam // Lank_10.117 //
S04bsu021_u:4039: avyākṛtāni sarvāṇi taireva hi prakāśitam // Lank_10.118 //
S04bsu021_u:4042: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyāṃ paramārthe na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4046: abhilāpasaṃbhavo bhāvo nāstīti ca na vidyate // Lank_10.121 //
S04bsu021_u:4051: niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhavettaddhi sarvathāpi na vidyate // Lank_10.123 //
S04bsu021_u:4056: māyāhastī yathā citraṃ patrāṇi kanakā yathā /
S04bsu021_u:4057: tathā dṛśyaṃ nṛṇāṃ khyāti citte ajñānavāsite // Lank_10.126 //
S04bsu021_u:4058: āryo na paśyate bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare /
S04bsu021_u:4060: bhrāntiṃ vidhūya sarvāṃ tu nimittaṃ yadi jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4061: saiva cāsya bhavedbhrāntiraśuddhaṃ timiraṃ yathā // Lank_10.128 //
S04bsu021_u:4068: bandho bandhyaśca baddhaśca ṣaḍete mokṣahetavaḥ // Lank_10.131 //
S04bsu021_u:4069: na bhūmayo na satyāni na kṣetrā na ca nirmitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4073: cittaṃ hi sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadeheṣu vartate /
S04bsu021_u:4075: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
S04bsu021_u:4076: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca te vai na santi ca // Lank_10.135 //
S04bsu021_u:4078: yadi te bhavedyathādṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ // Lank_10.136 //
S04bsu021_u:4080: na ca te tathā yathādṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca // Lank_10.137 //
S04bsu021_u:4085: vaipākikāśca ye buddhā jinā nairmāṇikāśca ye /
S04bsu021_u:4086: sattvāśca bodhisattvāśca kṣetrāṇi ca diśe diśe // Lank_10.140 //
S04bsu021_u:4088: sarve te hyamitābhasya sukhāvatyā vinirgatāḥ // Lank_10.141 //
S04bsu021_u:4092: yaddhi nairmāṇikābhāṣṭaṃ na tu vaipākikairjinaiḥ // Lank_10.143 //
S04bsu021_u:4093: anutpannā hyamī dharmā na caivaite na santi ca /
S04bsu021_u:4097: cittaṃ hi jāyate nānyaccittameva nirudhyate // Lank_10.145 //
S04bsu021_u:4098: arthābhāsaṃ nṛṇāṃ cittaṃ cittaṃ vai khyāti kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:4105: tathatārambaṇaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham // Lank_10.149 //
S04bsu021_u:4107: paratantraṃ samāśritya vikalpo bhramate nṛṇām // Lank_10.150 //
S04bsu021_u:4109: parāvṛttaṃ hi tathatā vihāraḥ kalpavarjitaḥ // Lank_10.151 //
S04bsu021_u:4110: mā vikalpaṃ vikalpetha vikalpo nāsti satyataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4114: bāhyārthadarśanaṃ mithyā nāstyarthaṃ cittameva tu // Lank_10.153 //
S04bsu021_u:4116: bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_10.154 //
S04bsu021_u:4123: ghṛtakumbhe mūṣikā yadvatsaha śukreṇa vardhate // Lank_10.157 //
S04bsu021_u:4130: cakṣuṣā sphurate rūpaṃ vivṛddhiṃ yāti kalpanāt // Lank_10.160 //
S04bsu021_u:4132: vācā pravartate nṝṇāṃ śukasyeva vikalpanā // Lank_10.161 //
S04bsu021_u:4136: paścātkāle gate nāthe brūhi ko 'yaṃ dhariṣyati // Lank_10.163 //
S04bsu021_u:4138: mahāmate nibodha tvaṃ yo netrīṃ dhārayiṣyati // Lank_10.164 //
S04bsu021_u:4140: nāgāhvayaḥ sa nāmnā tu sadasatpakṣadārakaḥ // Lank_10.165 //
S04bsu021_u:4142: āsādya bhūmiṃ muditāṃ yāsyate 'sau sukhāvatīm // Lank_10.166 //
S04bsu021_u:4146: pratyayāntargataṃ bhāvaṃ ye kalpentyasti nāsti ca /
S04bsu021_u:4155: abhāvasvabhāvā ye tu te vikalpitalakṣaṇāḥ // Lank_10.172 //
S04bsu021_u:4160: nirvikalpaśca deśemi ye te niṣpannalakṣaṇāḥ // Lank_10.174 //
S04bsu021_u:4162: dvayāntapatitaṃ cittaṃ tasmātprajñā na kalpitā // Lank_10.175 //
S04bsu021_u:4163: asti nāsti ca dvāvantau yāvaccittasya gocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4166: vidyate tathatāvasthā āryāṇāṃ gocaro yathā // Lank_10.177 //
S04bsu021_u:4167: bālānāṃ na tathā khyāti yathā khyāti manīṣiṇām /
S04bsu021_u:4168: manīṣiṇāṃ tathā khyāti sarvadharmā alakṣaṇāḥ // Lank_10.178 //
S04bsu021_u:4170: asuvarṇaṃ suvarṇābhaṃ tathā dharmāḥ kutārkikaiḥ // Lank_10.179 //
S04bsu021_u:4171: abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati /
S04bsu021_u:4172: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ // Lank_10.180 //
S04bsu021_u:4174: kāraṇakaravalloke na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.181 //
S04bsu021_u:4175: atīto vidyate bhāvo vidyate ca anāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4178: antarābhavasaṃgrāhaṃ ye kalpanti na te budhāḥ // Lank_10.183 //
S04bsu021_u:4179: na pratītyasamutpannaṃ lokaṃ varṇanti vai jināḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4180: kiṃ tu pratyayamevāyaṃ loko gandharvasaṃnibhaḥ // Lank_10.184 //
S04bsu021_u:4182: saṃketācca pṛthagbhūto na jāto na nirudhyate // Lank_10.185 //
S04bsu021_u:4183: darpaṇe udake netre bhāṇḍeṣu ca maṇīṣu ca /
S04bsu021_u:4184: bimbaṃ hi dṛśyate teṣu na ca bimbo 'sti kutracit // Lank_10.186 //
S04bsu021_u:4185: bhāvābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
S04bsu021_u:4186: dṛśyate citrarūpeṇa svapne vandhyauraso yathā // Lank_10.187 //
S04bsu021_u:4187: na me yānaṃ mahāyānaṃ na ghoṣo na ca akṣarāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4188: na satyā na vimokṣā vai na nirābhāsagocaram // Lank_10.188 //
S04bsu021_u:4192: ekatvena pṛthaktvena bhāvo vai pratyaye na tu /
S04bsu021_u:4193: janma samāsamevoktaṃ nirodho nāśa eva hi // Lank_10.190 //
S04bsu021_u:4197: kāyo manomayaṃ citraṃ paryāyairdeśitaṃ mayā // Lank_10.192 //
S04bsu021_u:4199: granthato na tu arthena na te nairātmyamāśritāḥ // Lank_10.193 //
S04bsu021_u:4200: na tīrthikairna buddhaiśca na mayā na ca kenacit /
S04bsu021_u:4205: tasyāstināsti nopaiti viviktaṃ paśyato jagat // Lank_10.196 //
S04bsu021_u:4207: ye tu kalpenti te bhrāntā mṛgatṛṣṇāṃ yathā mṛgāḥ // Lank_10.197 //
S04bsu021_u:4209: nirhetukaṃ vikalpaṃ hi vikalpo 'pi na yujyate // Lank_10.198 //
S04bsu021_u:4210: ajale ca jalagrāho mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
S04bsu021_u:4211: dṛśyate 'rtho hi bālānāmāryāṇāṃ na viśeṣataḥ // Lank_10.199 //
S04bsu021_u:4217: śrāvakāṇāṃ ca deśemi tathā sāmānyalakṣaṇam // Lank_10.202 //
S04bsu021_u:4223: daśamī tu bhavetprathamī prathamī cāṣṭamī bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:4224: navamī saptamī cāpi saptamī cāṣṭamī bhavet // Lank_10.205 //
S04bsu021_u:4225: dvitīyā tu tṛtīyā syāccaturthī pañcamī bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:4226: tṛtīyā tu bhavetṣaṣṭhī nirābhāse kramaḥ kutaḥ // Lank_10.206 //
S04bsu021_u:4229: kathaṃ hyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ kurute samatāṃ katham /
S04bsu021_u:4230: yadā cittaṃ na jānāti bāhyamadhyātmikaṃ calam /
S04bsu021_u:4231: tadā tu kurute nāśaṃ samatācittadarśanāt // Lank_10.208 //
S04bsu021_u:4233: bālaiḥ kīla yathā kīlaṃ pralobhya vinivartate // Lank_10.209 //
S04bsu021_u:4235: hetuṃ dadāti cittasya vijñānaṃ ca samāśritam // Lank_10.210 //
S04bsu021_u:4237: labhyante yena vai svapne abhijñāśca caturvidhāḥ // Lank_10.211 //
S04bsu021_u:4238: svapne ca labhyate yacca yacca buddhaprasādataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4241: bālā yadā na budhyante utpādaṃ deśayettadā // Lank_10.213 //
S04bsu021_u:4245: adṛśyaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ hi kasya kiṃ varṇyate kutaḥ // Lank_10.215 //
S04bsu021_u:4248: ālayo muñcate kāyaṃ manaḥ prārthayate gatim /
S04bsu021_u:4249: vijñānaṃ viṣayābhāsaṃ bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā pralabhyate // Lank_10.217 //
S04bsu021_u:4250: madīyaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ bāhyamarthaṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4258: cittamātre visaṃmūḍhā bhāvaṃ kalpenti bāhiram // Lank_10.221 //
S04bsu021_u:4260: gūḍhabījaṃ bhavedbodhau svapne vai sidhyate tu yaḥ // Lank_10.222 //
S04bsu021_u:4261: kutra keṣāṃ kathaṃ kasmātkimarthaṃ ca vadāhi me /
S04bsu021_u:4265: vikalpo mano nāma vijñānaiḥ pañcabhiḥ saha /
S04bsu021_u:4267: yadā cittaṃ manaścāpi vijñānaṃ na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4268: tadā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ labhate buddhabhūmi ca // Lank_10.226 //
S04bsu021_u:4269: pratyayā dhātavaḥ skandhā dharmāṇāṃ ca svalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4277: naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ ca bhāvaṃ ca śūnyā vai nityānityatā /
S04bsu021_u:4282: kuḍye sati yathā citraṃ parijñānānnirudhyate // Lank_10.233 //
S04bsu021_u:4288: na vāsanairbhidyate cittaṃ na cittaṃ vāsanaiḥ saha /
S04bsu021_u:4292: yathā na bhāvo nābhāvo gaganaṃ kathyate mayā /
S04bsu021_u:4293: ālayaṃ hi tathā kāye bhāvābhāvavivarjitam // Lank_10.238 //
S04bsu021_u:4297: cātuṣkoṭikayā muktaṃ bhavaṃ māyopamaṃ sadā // Lank_10.240 //
S04bsu021_u:4299: śeṣā bhaveyurniṣpannā bhūmayo buddhabhūmi ca // Lank_10.241 //
S04bsu021_u:4301: asmin kalevare sarvaṃ kathitaṃ cittagocaram // Lank_10.242 //
S04bsu021_u:4303: bhrāntiḥ svacittasaṃbodhānna pravartate na nivartate // Lank_10.243 //
S04bsu021_u:4305: māyādisadṛśaṃ paśyan lakṣaṇaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.244 //
S04bsu021_u:4314: nityaṃ ca śāśvataṃ tattvaṃ gotraṃ vastusvabhāvakam /
S04bsu021_u:4316: yadyadvastu na śuddhiḥ syātsaṃkleśo nāpi kasyacit /
S04bsu021_u:4323: bahirdhā dṛśyate nṝṇāṃ na hi cittasya dharmatā // Lank_10.252 //
S04bsu021_u:4324: cittasya dharmatā śuddhā na cittaṃ bhrāntisaṃbhavam /
S04bsu021_u:4325: bhrāntiśca dauṣṭhulyamayī tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate // Lank_10.253 //
S04bsu021_u:4327: na saṃskāre na cānyatra kiṃ tu saṃskāradarśanāt // Lank_10.254 //
S04bsu021_u:4329: vidhūtaṃ hi bhavettena svacittaṃ paśyato jagat // Lank_10.255 //
S04bsu021_u:4333: nirābhāsasthito yogī mahāyānaṃ sa paśyati // Lank_10.257 //
S04bsu021_u:4335: jñānamanātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāse na paśyati // Lank_10.258 //
S04bsu021_u:4337: prajñāyā gocaraṃ paśyellakṣaṇe na pramuhyate // Lank_10.259 //
S04bsu021_u:4339: dve satye buddhabhūmiśca prajñā yatra pravartate // Lank_10.260 //
S04bsu021_u:4344: grāhyaṃ grāho grahītā ca nāsti nāma hyavastukam /
S04bsu021_u:4345: nirhetukaṃ vikalpaṃ ye manyanti hi na te budhāḥ // Lank_10.263 //
S04bsu021_u:4346: arthe nāma hyasaṃbhūtamartho nāmni tathaiva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4349: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ vā bālo 'paśyan vidhāvati // Lank_10.265 //
S04bsu021_u:4356: satyaṃ paraṃ hyavaktavyaṃ nirodhe dharmadarśanam // Lank_10.268 //
S04bsu021_u:4357: ālayaṃ hi samāśritya mano vai saṃpravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4358: cittaṃ manaśca saṃśritya vijñānaṃ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.269 //
S04bsu021_u:4361: manaśca lakṣaṇaṃ vastu nityānitye na manyate /
S04bsu021_u:4362: utpādaṃ cāpyanutpādaṃ yogī yoge na manyate // Lank_10.271 //
S04bsu021_u:4364: ekamarthaṃ dvicittena na jānīte tadudbhavam // Lank_10.272 //
S04bsu021_u:4365: na vaktā na ca vācyo 'sti na śūnyaṃ cittadarśanāt /
S04bsu021_u:4368: na dhātavo na ca skandhā na rāgo na ca saṃskṛtam // Lank_10.274 //
S04bsu021_u:4369: karmaṇo 'gniṃ na vai pūrvaṃ na kṛtaṃ na ca saṃskṛtam /
S04bsu021_u:4370: na koṭi na ca vai śaktirna mokṣo na ca bandhanam // Lank_10.275 //
S04bsu021_u:4371: avyākṛto na bhāvo 'sti dharmādharmaṃ na caiva hi /
S04bsu021_u:4372: na kālaṃ na ca nirvāṇaṃ dharmatāpi na vidyate // Lank_10.276 //
S04bsu021_u:4373: na ca buddho na satyāni na phalaṃ na ca hetavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4374: viparyayo na nirvāṇaṃ vibhavo nāsti saṃbhavaḥ // Lank_10.277 //
S04bsu021_u:4375: dvādaśāṅgaṃ na caivāsti antānantaṃ na caiva hi /
S04bsu021_u:4377: kleśāḥ karmapathā dehaḥ kartāraśca phalaṃ ca vai /
S04bsu021_u:4382: skandhā na santi nirvāṇe na caivātmā na lakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4385: cittaṃ hyadṛśyasaṃbhūtaṃ tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate // Lank_10.282 //
S04bsu021_u:4387: cittaṃ na bhāvo nābhāvo vāsane na virājate // Lank_10.283 //
S04bsu021_u:4388: malo vai khyāyate śukle na śukle khyāyate malaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4389: ghane hi gaganaṃ yadvattathā cittaṃ na dṛśyate // Lank_10.284 //
S04bsu021_u:4390: cittena cīyate karma jñānena ca vicīyate /
S04bsu021_u:4391: prajñayā ca nirābhāsaṃ prabhāvaṃ cādhigacchati // Lank_10.285 //
S04bsu021_u:4393: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca jñānaṃ vai saṃpravartate // Lank_10.286 //
S04bsu021_u:4394: cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ saṃjñā vai kalpavarjitā /
S04bsu021_u:4395: avikalpadharmatāṃ prāptāḥ śrāvakā na jinātmajāḥ // Lank_10.287 //
S04bsu021_u:4396: kṣānte kṣānte viśeṣe vai jñānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham /
S04bsu021_u:4399: kalpitaṃ gṛhyate bhrāntyā paratantraṃ na kalpyate // Lank_10.289 //
S04bsu021_u:4400: cittaṃ hyabhūtasaṃbhūtaṃ na cittaṃ dṛśyate kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4404: prajñā hi trividhā mahyamāryaṃ yena prabhāvitam /
S04bsu021_u:4405: cittaṃ hyadṛśyasaṃbhūtaṃ tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate // Lank_10.292 //
S04bsu021_u:4407: lakṣaṇaṃ kalpate yena yaḥ svabhāvān vṛṇoti ca // Lank_10.293 //
S04bsu021_u:4414: vividhāgatirhi nirvṛttā yathā māyā na sidhyati /
S04bsu021_u:4415: nimittaṃ hi tathā citraṃ kalpyamānaṃ na sidhyati // Lank_10.296 //
S04bsu021_u:4418: ya eva kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraṃ tadeva hi /
S04bsu021_u:4419: kalpitaṃ hi vicitrābhaṃ paratantraṃ vikalpyate // Lank_10.298 //
S04bsu021_u:4422: yathā hi yogināṃ vastu citramekaṃ virājate /
S04bsu021_u:4423: na hyasti citratā tatra tathā kalpitalakṣaṇam // Lank_10.300 //
S04bsu021_u:4425: timiraṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ paratantraṃ tathā budhaiḥ // Lank_10.301 //
S04bsu021_u:4426: hemaṃ syāttu yathā śuddhaṃ jalaṃ kaluṣavarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:4427: gaganaṃ hi ghanābhāvāttathā śuddhaṃ vikalpitam // Lank_10.302 //
S04bsu021_u:4431: citte citte tu sattvānāṃ buddhabimbaṃ vidṛśyate // Lank_10.304 //
S04bsu021_u:4432: nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraṃ ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4433: samāropāpavādaṃ ca vikalpaṃ no vinaśyati // Lank_10.305 //
S04bsu021_u:4439: tadā prajñāyate śuddhaḥ svabhāavaḥ pāramārthikaḥ // Lank_10.308 //
S04bsu021_u:4441: tathatā ca pratyātmagatimato nāsti viśeṣaṇam // Lank_10.309 //
S04bsu021_u:4442: pañca dharmā bhavettatvaṃ svabhāvā hi trayastathā /
S04bsu021_u:4445: cittaṃ saṃdṛśyate nṝṇāṃ dṛśyābhaṃ vāsanoditam // Lank_10.311 //
S04bsu021_u:4447: bhūtālabdhātmakā hyete na lakṣyaṃ na ca lakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4448: sarve bhūtamayā bhūtā yadi rūpaṃ hi bhautikam // Lank_10.312 //
S04bsu021_u:4450: kāraṇaṃ hi mahābhūtāḥ kāryaṃ bhūsalilādayaḥ // Lank_10.313 //
S04bsu021_u:4452: svapnagandharvarūpaṃ ca mṛgatṛṣṇā ca pañcamam // Lank_10.314 //
S04bsu021_u:4453: icchantikaṃ pañcavidhaṃ gotrāḥ pañca tathā bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:4454: pañca yānānyayānaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ bhavet // Lank_10.315 //
S04bsu021_u:4458: kṣetramekaṃ hi buddhānāṃ buddhaścaikastathā bhavet // Lank_10.317 //
S04bsu021_u:4460: nairātmyaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ mahyaṃ jñeyaṃ cāpi caturvidham // Lank_10.318 //
S04bsu021_u:4467: adhvatrayaṃ na caivāsti nityānityaṃ ca nāsti vai /
S04bsu021_u:4468: kriyā karma phalaṃ caiva svapnakāryaṃ tathā bhavet // Lank_10.322 //
S04bsu021_u:4472: sarvakṣetragatāścāpi dṛśyante na ca yonijāḥ // Lank_10.324 //
S04bsu021_u:4483: gavaiḍakāśca dāsā vai tathā hayagajādayaḥ // Lank_10.329 //
S04bsu021_u:4484: talpaviddhe na svaptavyaṃ bhūmiścāpi na lepayet /
S04bsu021_u:4485: sauvarṇarājataṃ pātraṃ kāṃsaṃ tāmraṃ na kārayet // Lank_10.330 //
S04bsu021_u:4487: kardamaiḥ phalapatraiśca śuklān yogī rajetsadā // Lank_10.331 //
S04bsu021_u:4488: śailīkaṃ mṛnmayaṃ lohaṃ śāṅkhaṃ vai sphaṭikamayam /
S04bsu021_u:4489: pātrārthaṃ dhārayedyogī paripūrṇaṃ ca māgadham // Lank_10.332 //
S04bsu021_u:4491: śilpavidyāṃ na śikṣeta yogī yogaparāyaṇaḥ // Lank_10.333 //
S04bsu021_u:4495: gṛhasthairna ca saṃsṛṣṭaṃ yoginaṃ taṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.335 //
S04bsu021_u:4496: śūnyāgāre śmaśāne vā vṛkṣamūle guhāsu vā /
S04bsu021_u:4497: palāle 'bhyavakāśe ca yogī vāsaṃ prakalpayet // Lank_10.336 //
S04bsu021_u:4501: kusumebhyo yathā bhramarāstathā piṇḍaṃ samācaret // Lank_10.338 //
S04bsu021_u:4502: gaṇe ca gaṇasaṃsṛṣṭe bhikṣuṇīṣu ca yadbhavet /
S04bsu021_u:4503: taddhi ājīvasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ na tatkalpati yoginām // Lank_10.339 //
S04bsu021_u:4508: vihāre yatra vai dhūmaḥ pacyate vidhivatsadā /
S04bsu021_u:4509: uddiśya yatkṛtaṃ cāpi na tatkalpati yoginām // Lank_10.342 //
S04bsu021_u:4514: nacirāttu bhavedyogī yadyutpādaṃ na kalpayet // Lank_10.344 //
S04bsu021_u:4516: hetupratyayasaṃbhūtaṃ yogī lokaṃ na kalpayet // Lank_10.345 //
S04bsu021_u:4522: buddhāṃśca bodhisattvāṃśca namaskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ // Lank_10.348 //
S04bsu021_u:4524: pañcadharmasvacittaṃ ca nairātmyaṃ ca vibhāvayet // Lank_10.349 //
S04bsu021_u:4528: yogānārabhate citrāṃ gatvā śivapathīṃ śubhām // Lank_10.351 //
S04bsu021_u:4531: nimittāni ca citrāṇi tīrthyamārgaṃ nayanti te /
S04bsu021_u:4535: śiro hi tasya mārjanti nimittaṃ tathatānugāḥ // Lank_10.354 //
S04bsu021_u:4546: pratipanmadhyamā caiṣā mayā cānyaiśca deśitā // Lank_10.359 //
S04bsu021_u:4548: naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ dvayametanna kalpayet // Lank_10.360 //
S04bsu021_u:4549: vikalpavṛttyā bhāvo na mokṣaṃ kalpenti bāliśāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4558: anyathā kalpyamānaṃ hi tīrthyavādaḥ prasajyate // Lank_10.365 //
S04bsu021_u:4559: ajāḥ prasūtajanmā vai acyutāśca cyavanti ca /
S04bsu021_u:4561: ekadhā bahudhā bhūtvā varṣanti ca jvalanti vai /
S04bsu021_u:4562: citte cintamayā bhūtvā cittamātraṃ vadanti te // Lank_10.367 //
S04bsu021_u:4566: anyaiśca vividhai rūpaiścittamātraṃ vadanti te // Lank_10.369 //
S04bsu021_u:4568: rūpaṃ darśyanti sattvānāṃ cittamātrasya kāraṇam // Lank_10.370 //
S04bsu021_u:4569: māyopamaṃ samādhiṃ ca kāyaṃ cāpi manomayam /
S04bsu021_u:4570: daśa bhūmīśca vaśitāḥ parāvṛttā labhanti te // Lank_10.371 //
S04bsu021_u:4574: nimittaṃ paratantraṃ hi yannāma tatra kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:4576: buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ hi na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:4577: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā prakalpyate // Lank_10.374 //
S04bsu021_u:4579: bhāvābhāvavinirmuktau dvau svabhāvau kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_10.375 //
S04bsu021_u:4580: parikalpite svabhāve ca svabhāvau dvau pratiṣṭhitau /
S04bsu021_u:4583: anyathā kalpyamānaṃ hi tīrthyavādaṃ samāśrayet // Lank_10.377 //
S04bsu021_u:4586: kṣetraṃ buddhāśca nirmāṇā ekaṃ yānaṃ trayaṃ tathā /
S04bsu021_u:4587: na nirvāṇamahaṃ sarve śūnyā utpattivarjitāḥ // Lank_10.379 //
S04bsu021_u:4590: yathā hi kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ khyāyate citradarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:4591: na hyasti citratā tatra buddhadharmaṃ tathā jagat // Lank_10.381 //
S04bsu021_u:4592: dharmabuddho bhavedbuddhaḥ śeṣā vai tasya nirmitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4595: vikalpā tathatā nānyā na nimittā vikalpanā // Lank_10.383 //
S04bsu021_u:4597: ṣaṭtriṃśakaṃ buddhagaṇaṃ buddhaḥ svābhāviko bhavet // Lank_10.384 //
S04bsu021_u:4598: nīle rakte 'tha lavaṇe śaṅkhe kṣīre ca śārkare /
S04bsu021_u:4599: kaṣāyaiḥ phalapuṣpādyaiḥ kiraṇā yatha bhāskare // Lank_10.385 //
S04bsu021_u:4600: na cānye na ca nānanye taraṃgā hyudadhāviva /
S04bsu021_u:4601: vijñānāni tathā sapta cittena saha saṃyutā // Lank_10.386 //
S04bsu021_u:4603: ālayaṃ hi tathā citraṃ vijñānākhyaṃ pravartate // Lank_10.387 //
S04bsu021_u:4606: abhinnalakṣaṇānyaṣṭau na ca lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇam // Lank_10.388 //
S04bsu021_u:4608: vijñānānāṃ tathā citte pariṇāmo na labhyate // Lank_10.389 //
S04bsu021_u:4609: cittena cīyate karma manasā ca vicīyate /
S04bsu021_u:4610: vijñānena vijānāti dṛśyaṃ kalpeti pañcabhiḥ // Lank_10.390 //
S04bsu021_u:4614: vṛttiśca varṇyate citte lakṣaṇārthaṃ hi bāliśāḥ // Lank_10.392 //
S04bsu021_u:4615: na tasya vidyate vṛttiḥ svacittaṃ grāhyavarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:4616: grāhye sati hi vai grāhastaraṃgaiḥ saha sādhyate // Lank_10.393 //
S04bsu021_u:4620: ālayasya tathā vṛttiḥ kasmādbuddhyā na gṛhyate // Lank_10.395 //
S04bsu021_u:4624: tathā tvaṃ lokapradyota tattvaṃ deśesi bāliśān // Lank_10.397 //
S04bsu021_u:4626: bhāṣase yadi tattvaṃ vai tattvaṃ citte na vidyate // Lank_10.398 //
S04bsu021_u:4631: pañcānāṃ khyāyate dṛśyaṃ kramo nāsti samāhite // Lank_10.400 //
S04bsu021_u:4633: citrārthe nāmayedraṅgaṃ deśanāpi tathā mama // Lank_10.401 //
S04bsu021_u:4634: raṅge na vidyate citraṃ na kuḍye na ca bhājane /
S04bsu021_u:4638: kṛtvā dharme vyavasthānaṃ tattvaṃ deśemi yoginām // Lank_10.403 //
S04bsu021_u:4641: vicitrā hi yathā māyā dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4642: deśanā hi tathā citrā dṛśyate 'vyabhicāriṇī // Lank_10.405 //
S04bsu021_u:4645: buddhā hi tadvatsattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti te // Lank_10.406 //
S04bsu021_u:4647: tantraṃ hi yena gṛhṇāti yadgṛhṇāti sa kalpitam // Lank_10.407 //
S04bsu021_u:4649: dvidhā pravartate bhrāntistṛtīyaṃ nāsti kāraṇam // Lank_10.408 //
S04bsu021_u:4657: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ nityaṃ kalpyate na ca vidyate // Lank_10.412 //
S04bsu021_u:4659: asanto vā vidṛśyante paratantraṃ tathā bhavet // Lank_10.413 //
S04bsu021_u:4662: cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ nairātmyaṃ syāddvayaṃ tathā /
S04bsu021_u:4663: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvā hi buddhānāṃ gocaro hyayam // Lank_10.415 //
S04bsu021_u:4665: raṅgaṃ hi yathāpyekaṃ kuḍye citraṃ vidṛśyate // Lank_10.416 //
S04bsu021_u:4667: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvā hi mama gotre na santi te // Lank_10.417 //
S04bsu021_u:4671: kāyena vācā manasā na tatra kriyate śubham /
S04bsu021_u:4674: kāyaṃ manomayaṃ cittaṃ gotraṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham // Lank_10.420 //
S04bsu021_u:4676: aṣṭamī buddhabhūmiśca gotraṃ tāthāgataṃ bhavet // Lank_10.421 //
S04bsu021_u:4678: etaddhi gotraṃ buddhānāṃ śeṣā yānadvayāvahā // Lank_10.422 //
S04bsu021_u:4680: deśyante bhūmayaḥ sapta buddhaiścittavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_10.423 //
S04bsu021_u:4684: kurvanti jinaputrā vai nṛpatvaṃ ca bhavālaye // Lank_10.425 //
S04bsu021_u:4688: pratyekaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca deśanā na jinaurasām // Lank_10.427 //
S04bsu021_u:4689: saccāsacca sato naiva kṣaṇikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na vai /
S04bsu021_u:4691: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4696: abhilāpasaṃbhavo bhāvo dṛṣṭvā vai nāsti vidyate // Lank_10.431 //
S04bsu021_u:4698: ālayaṃ tu tathā śuddhaṃ taraṃge na virājate // Lank_10.432 //
S04bsu021_u:4700: vijñānapañcakaiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛśyaṃ kalpati raṅgavat // Lank_10.433 //
S04bsu021_u:4703: buddhā hyete bhavetpaurāḥ śeṣā nirmāṇavigrahāḥ // Lank_10.434 //
S04bsu021_u:4704: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpramuhyate /
S04bsu021_u:4707: nairātmyaṃ dvitayaṃ śuddhaṃ prabhāṣante vināyakāḥ // Lank_10.436 //
S04bsu021_u:4709: yaṃ deśayanti vai nāthā pratyātmagatigocaram // Lank_10.437 //
S04bsu021_u:4712: aṇuśo vibhajya dravyaṃ na vai rūpaṃ vikalpayet /
S04bsu021_u:4714: mā śūnyatāṃ vikalpetha māśūnyamiti vā punaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4715: nāstyasti kalpanaiveyaṃ kalpyamarthaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.440 //
S04bsu021_u:4717: ekaikamaṇuśo nāsti ato 'pyarthaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.441 //
S04bsu021_u:4719: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyamato 'pyarthaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.442 //
S04bsu021_u:4720: citraṃ keśoṇḍukaṃ māyāṃ svapna gandharvameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4721: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām // Lank_10.443 //
S04bsu021_u:4729: tathā ca śrāvako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate // Lank_10.447 //
S04bsu021_u:4730: niṣṭhāgatirna tattasyā na ca bhūyo nivartate /
S04bsu021_u:4731: samādhikāyaṃ saṃprāpya ā kalpānna prabudhyate // Lank_10.448 //
S04bsu021_u:4736: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam // Lank_10.450 //
S04bsu021_u:4737: paṅkamagno yathā hastī itastato na dhāvati /
S04bsu021_u:4738: samādhimadamagnā vai tathā tiṣṭhanti śrāvakāḥ // Lank_10.451 //
S04bsu021_u:4740: abhiṣekasamādhyādyaṃ prathamā daśamī ca vai // Lank_10.452 //
S04bsu021_u:4741: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4746: niṣpannaṃ tathatetyuktaṃ sūtre sūtre sadā mayā // Lank_10.455 //
S04bsu021_u:4747: vyañjanaṃ padakāyaṃ ca nāma cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4748: bālāḥ sajanti durmedhā yathā paṅke mahāgajāḥ // Lank_10.456 //
S04bsu021_u:4750: tāthāgataṃ ca pratyekaṃ yānānyetān vadāmyaham // Lank_10.457 //
S04bsu021_u:4751: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4752: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāyinaḥ // Lank_10.458 //
S04bsu021_u:4754: ālayaṃ tribhavaśceṣṭā ete cittasya paryayāḥ // Lank_10.459 //
S04bsu021_u:4757: cittena dhāryate kāyo mano manyati vai sadā /
S04bsu021_u:4758: vijñānaṃ cittaviṣayaṃ vijñānaiḥ saha chindati // Lank_10.461 //
S04bsu021_u:4759: tṛṣṇā hi mātā ityuktā avidyā ca tathā pitā /
S04bsu021_u:4766: siddhāntaśca nayaścāpi pratyātmaṃ śāsanaṃ ca vai /
S04bsu021_u:4767: ye paśyanti vibhāgajñā na te tarkavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_10.465 //
S04bsu021_u:4768: na bhāvo vidyate satyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:4769: abhāvena tu vai mokṣaṃ kathaṃ necchanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.466 //
S04bsu021_u:4771: dṛṣṭidvayaṃ prapuṣṇanti na ca jānanti pratyayān // Lank_10.467 //
S04bsu021_u:4774: rāgo na vidyate dveṣo mohaścāpi na pudgalaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4775: tṛṣṇāyā hyuditāḥ skandhā vidyante svapnasādṛśāḥ // Lank_10.469 //
S04bsu021_u:4776: yasyāṃ ca rātryāṃ dhigamo yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4779: taiśca buddhairmayā caiva na ca kiṃcidviśeṣitam // Lank_10.471 //
S04bsu021_u:4781: skandhā vidyanti bhāvena ātmā teṣu na vidyate // Lank_10.472 //
S04bsu021_u:4783: mucyate sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ svacittaṃ paśyato jagat // Lank_10.473 //
S04bsu021_u:4785: cātuṣkoṭikayā yukto na te mannayakovidāḥ // Lank_10.474 //
S04bsu021_u:4789: tadā vyāvartate cittaṃ nairātmyaṃ cādhigacchati // Lank_10.476 //
S04bsu021_u:4791: kāryaṃ hi pratyayāḥ sarve na kāryājjāyate bhavaḥ // Lank_10.477 //
S04bsu021_u:4792: kāryaṃ na jāyate kāryaṃ dvitvaṃ kārye prasajyate /
S04bsu021_u:4795: nimittaṃ cittamātraṃ hi cittamātraṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.479 //
S04bsu021_u:4798: niṣṭhābhāvaparaṃ brahma etāṃ mātrāṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.480 //
S04bsu021_u:4799: prajñaptisatyato hyātmā dravyaḥ sa hi na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4800: skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ // Lank_10.481 //
S04bsu021_u:4808: kāyaṃ manomayaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.485 //
S04bsu021_u:4810: bahirdhā jāyate nṝṇāṃ cittamātraṃ hi laukikam // Lank_10.486 //
S04bsu021_u:4811: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate bāhyaṃ cittacitraṃ vidṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:4815: bahirdhā nāsti vai rūpaṃ svacittaṃ dṛśyate bahiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4819: na hetavo na koṭyo vai dṛṣṭāntāvayavāni ca /
S04bsu021_u:4820: svacittaṃ hyarthasaṃkrāntaṃ yadi jānanti paṇḍitāḥ // Lank_10.491 //
S04bsu021_u:4822: kalpitaṃ ca samāśritya vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.492 //
S04bsu021_u:4826: yadarthābhāḥ pravartante svabhāvakalpito hi saḥ // Lank_10.494 //
S04bsu021_u:4830: yathā hi darpaṇe bimbaṃ keśoṇḍustimirasya vā /
S04bsu021_u:4831: tathā hi vāsanaiśchannaṃ cittaṃ paśyanti bāliśāḥ // Lank_10.496 //
S04bsu021_u:4833: artho na vidyate bāhyo yathā tīrthyairvikalpyate // Lank_10.497 //
S04bsu021_u:4834: rajjuṃ yathā hyajānānāḥ sarpaṃ gṛhṇanti bāliśāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4837: kiṃ tu svacittadoṣo 'yaṃ yena rajjurvikalpyate // Lank_10.499 //
S04bsu021_u:4838: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na lakṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:4841: ato nāsti na gantavyaṃ astitvaṃ na ca kalpayet // Lank_10.501 //
S04bsu021_u:4842: kalpitaṃ kalpyamānaṃ hi yadidaṃ na tadātmakam /
S04bsu021_u:4843: anātmakaṃ kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.502 //
S04bsu021_u:4845: avidyamāne dṛśye tu vikalpastena jāyate // Lank_10.503 //
S04bsu021_u:4847: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā kena bhrāmitā brūhi me mune // Lank_10.504 //
S04bsu021_u:4848: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā nāsti cittamātraṃ ca dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:4850: kalpitaṃ yadi vai nāsti yathā kalpati bāliśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4851: anyathā vidyate cāsau na ca buddhyāvagamyate // Lank_10.506 //
S04bsu021_u:4852: āryāṇāṃ yadi vā so 'sti nāsau bālairvikalpitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4853: āryāṇāmatha mithyāsau āryā bālaiḥ samaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_10.507 //
S04bsu021_u:4857: etaddhi putra mā kranda gṛhṇa citramidaṃ phalam // Lank_10.509 //
S04bsu021_u:4860: abhūtvā yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairna ca saṃkulaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4863: alabdhātmakaṃ hyajātaṃ ca pratyayairna vinā kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4864: utpannamapi te bhāvo pratyayairna vinā kvacit // Lank_10.512 //
S04bsu021_u:4868: pratyayairna ca jānanti māyāsvapnopamaṃ jagat // Lank_10.514 //
S04bsu021_u:4870: arthaṃ sunītaṃ hi mayā na ca budhyanti bāliśāḥ // Lank_10.515 //
S04bsu021_u:4872: vyabhicaranti te hyarthaṃ yasmāttarkeṇa deśitāḥ // Lank_10.516 //
S04bsu021_u:4873: lakṣaṇaṃ bhāva saṃsthānaṃ nāma caiva caturvidham /
S04bsu021_u:4876: somabhāskarayorbhāvā ye nāśenti na te sutāḥ // Lank_10.518 //
S04bsu021_u:4879: eṣā hi mudrā muktānāṃ putrāṇāṃ mama śāsane /
S04bsu021_u:4882: nityānityaṃ na prāpnoti saṃsāraśca na vidyate // Lank_10.521 //
S04bsu021_u:4885: pradhvaṃsi patitaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānaṃ ca bhavālaye /
S04bsu021_u:4886: rūpavijñānasaṃbaddhaṃ na ca karma vinaśyati // Lank_10.523 //
S04bsu021_u:4887: atha taiḥ saha saṃbaddhaṃ karma vai dhvasyate nṛṇām /
S04bsu021_u:4888: dhvaste tu karmasaṃbandhe na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_10.524 //
S04bsu021_u:4889: atha dhvastamapi taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsāre yadi jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4891: nābhinnaṃ na ca vai bhinnaṃ cittaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpanāt /
S04bsu021_u:4897: nāstyasti kathaṃ bhavati rūpe cānityatā yathā // Lank_10.528 //
S04bsu021_u:4900: kalpitaṃ hi vināśete mama netrī vinaśyate /
S04bsu021_u:4901: samāropāpavādaṃ ca kurvate mama śāsane // Lank_10.530 //
S04bsu021_u:4903: sarve ca te hyasaṃkathyā mama netrīvināśakāḥ // Lank_10.531 //
S04bsu021_u:4908: nāsau śikṣati buddhānāṃ yasteṣāṃ saṃgrahe caret /
S04bsu021_u:4909: dvayāntapatitā hyete anyeṣāṃ ca vināśakāḥ // Lank_10.534 //
S04bsu021_u:4910: viviktaṃ kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ ye tu paśyanti yoginaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4911: bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaṃ teṣāṃ vai saṃgrahe caret // Lank_10.535 //
S04bsu021_u:4914: tathā hi sattvagotrāṇi citrā vai karmavarjitā /
S04bsu021_u:4915: dṛśyābhāvānna karmāsti na ca vai karmajā gatiḥ // Lank_10.537 //
S04bsu021_u:4917: kiṃ tu vidyanti vai bhāvā yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ // Lank_10.538 //
S04bsu021_u:4918: yadi bhāvā va vidyante yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4919: asatsu sattvabhāveṣu saṃkleśo nāsti kasyacit // Lank_10.539 //
S04bsu021_u:4922: yeṣāṃ tu bhāvo vai nāsti yathā bālairvikalpitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4923: teṣāṃ na vidyate vṛttirindriyāṇāṃ na yoginaḥ // Lank_10.541 //
S04bsu021_u:4926: ayaṃ tena bhavenmokṣo bālānāṃ kriyavarjitaḥ // Lank_10.542 //
S04bsu021_u:4928: āryāṇāṃ nāsti vai bhāvo vimokṣatrayacāriṇām // Lank_10.543 //
S04bsu021_u:4936: kalpito nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.547 //
S04bsu021_u:4940: nava dravyāṇi nityāni kudṛṣṭyā deśayiṣyati // Lank_10.549 //
S04bsu021_u:4942: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatāmanyāṃ satīṃ vai nāśayiṣyati // Lank_10.550 //
S04bsu021_u:4944: pūrvā ca koṭirnaivāsti saṃsārasya vadāmyaham // Lank_10.551 //
S04bsu021_u:4949: paṭaiśca vai kaṭo nāsti paṭo vai vīraṇaistathā /
S04bsu021_u:4950: eka ekatrā saṃbhūtaḥ pratyayaiḥ kiṃ na jāyate // Lank_10.554 //
S04bsu021_u:4952: paravādā hyamī sarve mayā ca samudāhṛtāḥ // Lank_10.555 //
S04bsu021_u:4954: nivārya tu matisteṣāṃ svapakṣaṃ deśayāmyaham // Lank_10.556 //
S04bsu021_u:4956: mā me śiṣyagaṇo mūḍhaḥ sadasatpakṣamāśrayet // Lank_10.557 //
S04bsu021_u:4959: śiṣyebhyaḥ saṃprakāśeti guṇānāṃ ca vikāritā // Lank_10.558 //
S04bsu021_u:4960: na bhūtaṃ nāpi cābhūtaṃ pratyayairna ca pratyayāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4965: ahetukaṃ sadā paśyan vikalpo na pravartate // Lank_10.561 //
S04bsu021_u:4969: vastu na vidyate paśyaṃścittamātraṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4970: avastukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.563 //
S04bsu021_u:4972: ahetukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.564 //
S04bsu021_u:4974: vidyante na ca vidyante na te mannayakovidāḥ // Lank_10.565 //
S04bsu021_u:4976: etaddhi laukikaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.566 //
S04bsu021_u:4978: dvicittatā prasajyeta na ca cittaṃ dvilakṣaṇam // Lank_10.567 //
S04bsu021_u:4979: svadhāraṃ hi yathā khaḍgaṃ svāgraṃ vai aṅguliryathā /
S04bsu021_u:4980: na chindate na spṛśate tathā cittaṃ svadarśane // Lank_10.568 //
S04bsu021_u:4981: na paraṃ na ca vai tantraṃ kalpitaṃ vastumeva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4982: pañca dharmā dvicittaṃ ca nirābhāse na santi vai // Lank_10.569 //
S04bsu021_u:4984: utpādakaṃ hi saṃdhāya naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.570 //
S04bsu021_u:4985: atha vaicitryasaṃsthāne kalpā ca yadi jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4986: ākāśe śaśaśṛṅge ca arthābhāsaṃ bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.571 //
S04bsu021_u:4988: na ca vai kalpito hyarthaścittādanyo 'bhilapyate // Lank_10.572 //
S04bsu021_u:4990: anādimati saṃsāre artho vai nāsti kutracit /
S04bsu021_u:4991: apuṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ cittamarthābhāsaṃ pravartate // Lank_10.573 //
S04bsu021_u:4993: na cābhāvena vai puṣṭo vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.574 //
S04bsu021_u:4994: yathāpi dānīṃ naivāsti tathā pūrve 'pi nāstyasau /
S04bsu021_u:4995: anarthe arthasaṃbaddhaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pravartate // Lank_10.575 //
S04bsu021_u:5001: anādāvapi nāstyartho viśeṣaḥ kena jāyate // Lank_10.578 //
S04bsu021_u:5003: arthābhāve kathaṃ cittaṃ jāyate brūhi me mune // Lank_10.579 //
S04bsu021_u:5004: ahetukamidaṃ sarvaṃ na cittaṃ na ca gocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5005: na ca vai puṣyate cittaṃ tribhavaṃ kriyavarjitam // Lank_10.580 //
S04bsu021_u:5008: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca // Lank_10.581 //
S04bsu021_u:5010: anutpannān svabhāvāṃśca śūnyāḥ kena vadāsi me // Lank_10.582 //
S04bsu021_u:5014: ahetukā pi dṛśyante tathā lokavicitratā // Lank_10.584 //
S04bsu021_u:5016: na tu tīrthyadṛṣṭyā pralayo samavāyo na vidyate // Lank_10.585 //
S04bsu021_u:5018: anutpādaiḥ prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati // Lank_10.586 //
S04bsu021_u:5020: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet // Lank_10.587 //
S04bsu021_u:5025: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me // Lank_10.589 //
S04bsu021_u:5026: na ca bhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:5027: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam // Lank_10.590 //
S04bsu021_u:5036: na bāhyabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ na ca cittaparigraham /
S04bsu021_u:5039: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā // Lank_10.596 //
S04bsu021_u:5041: kalapācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate // Lank_10.597 //
S04bsu021_u:5042: bhāvo na vidyate hyanyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:5045: anyatra hi kalāpo 'yaṃ pravartate nivartate // Lank_10.599 //
S04bsu021_u:5049: deśemi saṃkalāmātraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_10.601 //
S04bsu021_u:5050: yasya janyo hi bhāvo 'sti saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:5053: yasya bhāvo bhavetkaścitsaṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit // Lank_10.603 //
S04bsu021_u:5056: saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthagbhūto yo dharmaḥ kalpito 'budhaiḥ // Lank_10.604 //
S04bsu021_u:5058: yaśca tasya anutpādaṃ tadanutpādakṣāntiḥ syāt // Lank_10.605 //
S04bsu021_u:5063: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:5064: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ // Lank_10.608 //
S04bsu021_u:5065: yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
S04bsu021_u:5066: anyonyapratyayā hyete te tena pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // Lank_10.609 //
S04bsu021_u:5068: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā // Lank_10.610 //
S04bsu021_u:5070: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedastu vidyate // Lank_10.611 //
S04bsu021_u:5072: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi bāliśān // Lank_10.612 //
S04bsu021_u:5076: yaddhetusamutpannaṃ sa ca nāsti te 'vagantavyam // Lank_10.614 //
S04bsu021_u:5077: astitvasādhakaṃ nāsti nāsti nāsti na yujyate /
S04bsu021_u:5079: kiṃcidāśritya punaḥ kiṃcitkhyāyate yasya vai matam /
S04bsu021_u:5080: ahetukaṃ yadāśritya kiṃciccāhetukaṃ na tu // Lank_10.616 //
S04bsu021_u:5082: anavasthā prasajyeta kiṃcicca kiṃ ca no bhavet // Lank_10.617 //
S04bsu021_u:5084: vastu tadvatsamāśritya vaicitryaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām // Lank_10.618 //
S04bsu021_u:5086: māyājālaṃ na parṇāni na kāṣṭhaṃ na ca śarkarā /
S04bsu021_u:5089: dṛśyakāle dvayaṃ nāsti kathaṃ kiṃcidvikalpyate // Lank_10.620 //
S04bsu021_u:5091: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_10.621 //
S04bsu021_u:5092: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu vikalpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:5093: apravṛttiṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.622 //
S04bsu021_u:5095: sārābhāvānna mokṣo 'sti na ca lokavicitratā // Lank_10.623 //
S04bsu021_u:5096: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:5105: kasyaite deśitā buddhaistvayā ca prativarṇitāḥ // Lank_10.628 //
S04bsu021_u:5107: buddhā deśenti vai yogaṃ mayā ca prativarṇitāḥ // Lank_10.629 //
S04bsu021_u:5109: gamanāgamanaṃ kena dṛśyate bhūtale nṛṇām // Lank_10.630 //
S04bsu021_u:5112: tathā hi dehinaḥ sarve vikalpena samīritāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5113: svacitte caṃkramante te gagane śukaniryathā // Lank_10.632 //
S04bsu021_u:5115: ābhā vṛttiḥ kathaṃ kena cittamātraṃ vadāhi me // Lank_10.633 //
S04bsu021_u:5121: nāma nāmni visaṃyuktaṃ yadā paśyati kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:5124: ye tvanyathāvabudhyante na te buddhā na bodhakāḥ // Lank_10.637 //
S04bsu021_u:5125: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvāśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:5127: yadā buddhiśca boddhavyaṃ viviktaṃ paśyate jagat /
S04bsu021_u:5128: nāsti nāma vikalpaśca tadā nābhipravartate // Lank_10.639 //
S04bsu021_u:5131: catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:5133: lakṣaṇasya parityāgānna bhūtaṃ na ca bhautikam /
S04bsu021_u:5139: ālayaṃ hi manasyātmā ātmīyaṃ jñānameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:5142: tadā dvayaṃ na kalpanti ātmā cātmīyameva ca // Lank_10.646 //
S04bsu021_u:5143: apravṛttaṃ na puṣṇāti na ca vijñānakāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:5145: vikalpaṃ cittamātraṃ ca lokaṃ kena vadāhi me /
S04bsu021_u:5151: astitvaṃ hi kathaṃ tasya cittagrāhānna jāyate // Lank_10.650 //
S04bsu021_u:5152: vikalpo na bhāvo nābhāvo ato 'stitvaṃ na jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:5155: nivārya pakṣāṃścatvāro yadi bhāvā sahetukāḥ // Lank_10.652 //
S04bsu021_u:5159: nityadoṣo nivāryate anityā yadi pratyayāḥ // Lank_10.654 //
S04bsu021_u:5160: na saṃbhavo na vibhavo anityatvāddhi bāliśām /
S04bsu021_u:5161: na hi naśyamānaṃ kiṃcidvai kāraṇatvena dṛśyate // Lank_10.655 //
S04bsu021_u:5162: adṛṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ kena nānityo jāyate bhavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5163: saṃgrahaiśca dametsattvān śīlena ca vaśīkaret // Lank_10.656 //
S04bsu021_u:5169: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ vidṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:5179: gatayaḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātā yatra jāyanti dehinaḥ // Lank_10.663 //
S04bsu021_u:5181: saraṃkṣya kuśalān sarvān viśeṣo mokṣa eva vā // Lank_10.664 //
S04bsu021_u:5183: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe tvayā yanmaraṇaṃ upapattiṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:5184: deśyate bhikṣuvargasya abhiprāyaṃ vadāhi me // Lank_10.665 //
S04bsu021_u:5188: vikalpo hi bhavejjanturvikalpo 'nyo na vidyate // Lank_10.667 //
S04bsu021_u:5190: rūpagrāhavinirmuktaṃ na janma na ca bhajyate // Lank_10.668 //
S04bsu021_u:5192: dharmadvayena vartante advayā tathatā bhavet // Lank_10.669 //
S04bsu021_u:5194: nityādayo bhavetkāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyayo bhavet // Lank_10.670 //
S04bsu021_u:5196: vādastava ca buddhānāṃ tasmānnāryo mahāmune // Lank_10.671 //
S04bsu021_u:5197: śarīre vyāmamātre ca lokaṃ vai lokasamudayam /
S04bsu021_u:5202: nivārārthaṃ tu dṛṣṭīnāṃ svabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.674 //
S04bsu021_u:5203: chidradoṣānna niyamo na vā cittaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:5205: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karma ca vijñānādyā ayonijāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5206: anavasthākṛtakatvaṃ ca na kṛtvā jāyate bhavaḥ // Lank_10.676 //
S04bsu021_u:5213: yuktiṃ vadāhi me nātha dvidhādṛṣṭinivāraṇāt // Lank_10.679 //
S04bsu021_u:5215: yathāhamanye ca sadā nāstyasti na visaṃkaret /
S04bsu021_u:5221: bhāvā hi sarve svavikalpasaṃbhavāstīrthyā vikalpenti jagatsvakāraṇaiḥ // Lank_10.682 //
S04bsu021_u:5223: rūpasya nāmānyetāni abhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.683 //
S04bsu021_u:5224: hastaḥ karo yathā loke indraḥ śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5225: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāmabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.684 //
S04bsu021_u:5226: rūpācca śūnyatā nānyā anutpādaṃ tathaiva ca /
S04bsu021_u:5235: ye vai jānanti yuktijñāste 'bhibudhyanti mannayam // Lank_10.689 //
S04bsu021_u:5238: bhāvā vidyantyanutpannā na vā brūhi mahāmune /
S04bsu021_u:5249: bhāvādbhāvāntaraṃ dṛṣṭiṃ cittaṃ vai tatsamutthitam // Lank_10.695 //
S04bsu021_u:5259: maṇḍalaṃ hi na me kiṃcinna ca deśemi dharmatām // Lank_10.700 //
S04bsu021_u:5260: dvaye sati hi doṣaḥ syāddvayaṃ buddhairviśodhitam /
S04bsu021_u:5261: śūnyāśca kṣaṇikā bhāvā niḥsvabhāvā hyajātikāḥ // Lank_10.701 //
S04bsu021_u:5263: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca vikalpasya vadāhi me // Lank_10.702 //
S04bsu021_u:5264: yathā yena prakāreṇa jāyate viṣayo mukham /
S04bsu021_u:5266: rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahirdhā vai vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate /
S04bsu021_u:5271: mā vikalpaṃ vikalpetha nirvikalpā hi paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5272: vikalpaṃ vikalpayaṃstasya dvayameva na nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_10.706 //
S04bsu021_u:5277: arthākāraṃ na cārtho 'sti yathābhūtaṃ vibhāvayet // Lank_10.708 //
S04bsu021_u:5279: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam // Lank_10.709 //
S04bsu021_u:5281: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāṃ saṃbhavo na hyasaṃbhavaḥ // Lank_10.710 //
S04bsu021_u:5285: svabalādhīnaṃ jinādhīnaṃ pañcamaṃ śrāvakaṃ nayet // Lank_10.712 //
S04bsu021_u:5293: bhūtānāṃ saṃniveśo 'yaṃ na bhūtairbhautikaṃ kṛtam // Lank_10.716 //
S04bsu021_u:5295: vāyunā kīryate rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhūtaiḥ pravartate // Lank_10.717 //
S04bsu021_u:5299: vyatibhinnāni rūpāṇi cittaṃ rūpaṃ na bhautikam // Lank_10.719 //
S04bsu021_u:5301: kāryakāraṇamutpādya śūnyatā asti nāsti ca // Lank_10.720 //
S04bsu021_u:5310: tīrthyā vadanti janma bhūtānāṃ bhautikasya ca // Lank_10.724 //
S04bsu021_u:5311: anutpannā yato ye 'nye tīrthyāḥ kalpanti kāraṇaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5312: na ca budhyanti mohena sadasatpakṣamāśritāḥ // Lank_10.725 //
S04bsu021_u:5314: viśuddhalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ jñānena saha tiṣṭhati // Lank_10.726 //
S04bsu021_u:5322: tathārūpyopapannasya bhavo 'rūpo na cāsti kim // Lank_10.730 //
S04bsu021_u:5324: tīrthyavādo na saṃdeho na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.731 //
S04bsu021_u:5325: rūpaṃ ca vidyate tatra ārūpye nāsti darśanam /
S04bsu021_u:5326: tadabhāvo na siddhānto na yānaṃ na ca yāyinam // Lank_10.732 //
S04bsu021_u:5328: aṣṭavidhaikadeśaṃ hi kṣaṇe kāle na gṛhṇanti // Lank_10.733 //
S04bsu021_u:5329: na pravartati yadā rūpaṃ indriyā na ca indriyaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5330: ato hi deśeti bhagavān kṣaṇikā indriyādayaḥ // Lank_10.734 //
S04bsu021_u:5332: apravṛttaṃ kathaṃ jñānaṃ saṃsāraṃ janayiṣyati // Lank_10.735 //
S04bsu021_u:5334: nairantaryaṃ na bhāvānāṃ vikalpaspandite gatau // Lank_10.736 //
S04bsu021_u:5335: indriyā indriyārthāśca mūḍhānāṃ na tu paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5336: bālā gṛhṇanti nāmena āryā vai arthakovidāḥ // Lank_10.737 //
S04bsu021_u:5337: ṣaṣṭhaṃ hi nirupādānaḥ sopādāno na gṛhyate /
S04bsu021_u:5343: cittena saha caikatvamanyatvaṃ vai manādibhiḥ // Lank_10.740 //
S04bsu021_u:5349: sopādānastathā hyātmā tārkikaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate // Lank_10.743 //
S04bsu021_u:5351: dṛṣṭāntaṃ kiṃ na kurvanti tārkikā ātmasādhakāḥ // Lank_10.744 //
S04bsu021_u:5357: lakṣaṇaṃ yadi jānāti jñānaṃ saṃjāyate nayam // Lank_10.747 //
S04bsu021_u:5359: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ na ca dharmāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // Lank_10.748 //
S04bsu021_u:5366: na pudgalo na ca skandhā buddho jñānamanāsravam /
S04bsu021_u:5367: sadāśāntiṃ vibhāvitvā gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ hyaham // Lank_10.752 //
S04bsu021_u:5369: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ deśeti vadatāṃvaraḥ // Lank_10.753 //
S04bsu021_u:5371: tairācitāni karmāṇi yataḥ kliśyanti tāvubhau // Lank_10.754 //
S04bsu021_u:5376: tiṣṭhanti na ca naśyante ātmā doṣaistathā vinā // Lank_10.756 //
S04bsu021_u:5380: vidyamānā na dṛśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.758 //
S04bsu021_u:5382: akovidā na gṛhṇanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.759 //
S04bsu021_u:5383: yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:5384: ātmā hi tadvatskandheṣu ayuktijño na paśyati // Lank_10.760 //
S04bsu021_u:5386: na paśyanti ayuktijñāstathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.761 //
S04bsu021_u:5388: vidyamānāṃ na paśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.762 //
S04bsu021_u:5390: samādhayo viśeṣāśca asatyātmani nāsti vai // Lank_10.763 //
S04bsu021_u:5392: sa vaktavyo bhavedvijñaḥ svavikalpaṃ pradarśaya // Lank_10.764 //
S04bsu021_u:5398: svarasaṃ vidyate teṣu anāsvādyaṃ na gṛhyate // Lank_10.767 //
S04bsu021_u:5400: na ca paśyantyavidvāṃso vidvān dṛṣṭvā vimucyate // Lank_10.768 //
S04bsu021_u:5402: yatra yasmādyadarthaṃ ca samūhaṃ nāvadhāryate // Lank_10.769 //
S04bsu021_u:5403: vilakṣaṇā hi vai dharmāścittamekaṃ na gṛhyate /
S04bsu021_u:5406: cittānupaśyī ca yogī cittaṃ citte na paśyati /
S04bsu021_u:5407: paśyako dṛśyanirjāto dṛśyaṃ kiṃ hetusaṃbhavam // Lank_10.771 //
S04bsu021_u:5410: paurāṇikamidaṃ vartma ahaṃ te ca tathāgatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5412: kāmadhātau tathārūpye na vai buddho vibudhyate /
S04bsu021_u:5416: asatyātmani māyādyā dharmā nāstyasti vai katham /
S04bsu021_u:5417: bālānāṃ khyāti tathatā kathaṃ nāsti nirātmikā // Lank_10.776 //
S04bsu021_u:5419: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_10.777 //
S04bsu021_u:5421: dvāvapyetau na janakau kāraṇaiḥ kalpyate katham // Lank_10.778 //
S04bsu021_u:5429: bālānāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa brahmacaryaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.782 //
S04bsu021_u:5431: vyañjitaiḥ pravrajantyeke na cānye ca pravādinaḥ // Lank_10.783 //
S04bsu021_u:5434: mayi nirvṛte varṣaśate vyāso vai bhāratastathā /
S04bsu021_u:5435: pāṇḍavāḥ kauravā rāmaḥ paścānmaurī bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.785 //
S04bsu021_u:5436: mauryā nandāśca guptāśca tato mlecchā nṛpādhamāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5438: kaliyugānte lokaiśca saddharmo hi na bhāvitaḥ // Lank_10.786 //
S04bsu021_u:5443: cātuṃ rvarṇā nṛpendrāśca ṛṣayo dharmameva ca // Lank_10.788 //
S04bsu021_u:5444: vedāśca yajñaṃ dānaṃ ca dharmasthā vartsyate punaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5446: evaṃ mayā śrutādibhyo loko vai vibhramiṣyati // Lank_10.789 //
S04bsu021_u:5451: vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ peyaṃ kaṭisūtraṃ ca dhārayet /
S04bsu021_u:5452: upapadyamānaṃ kālena bhaikṣyaṃ vā nīcavarjitam // Lank_10.791 //
S04bsu021_u:5456: bhuktvā tu suciraṃ dvīpāṃstṛṣṇayā vipraṇaśyati // Lank_10.793 //
S04bsu021_u:5458: ahaṃ cānye kṛtayuge śākyasiṃhaḥ kalau yuge // Lank_10.794 //
S04bsu021_u:5460: evamādyāni tīrthyāni nirvṛte me bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.795 //
S04bsu021_u:5464: evaṃ me nirvṛte paścādevamādyaṃ bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.797 //
S04bsu021_u:5465: mātā ca me vasumatiḥ pitā vipraḥ prajāpatiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5466: kātyāyanasagotro 'haṃ nāmnā vai virajo jinaḥ // Lank_10.798 //
S04bsu021_u:5467: campāyāṃ haṃ samutpannaḥ pitāpi ca pitāmahaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5475: ahaṃ ca virajo 'nye vai sarve te kṛtino jināḥ // Lank_10.802 //
S04bsu021_u:5478: na dvāpare na tretāyāṃ na paścācca kalau yuge /
S04bsu021_u:5479: saṃbhavo lokanāthānāṃ saṃbudhyante kṛte yuge // Lank_10.804 //
S04bsu021_u:5482: dvayaṅgulaṃ tryaṅgulaṃ vāpi candraṃ candrāntaraṃ bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:5483: anyathā citryamānaṃ hi lobhanīyaṃ hi bāliśān // Lank_10.806 //
S04bsu021_u:5488: ekaṃ ca bahudhā nāsti vailakṣaṇyānna kutracit /
S04bsu021_u:5489: vāyubhā grāhakāḥ sarve kṣetravaddāyakā bhavet // Lank_10.809 //
S04bsu021_u:5490: yadyekaṃ bahudhā vai syātsarve hyakṛtakā bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:5493: ekaṃ hi bahudhā bhavati tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ // Lank_10.811 //
S04bsu021_u:5495: godhūmadhānyajātāni ekaṃ hi bahudhā katham // Lank_10.812 //
S04bsu021_u:5501: rakṣakaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ rājā balī mahīpatiḥ // Lank_10.815 //
S04bsu021_u:5508: dadāti brahmā maheśvaro vanabhūmau vyavasthite // Lank_10.818 //
S04bsu021_u:5509: bhaviṣyati mahāyogī nāmnā vai virajo muniḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5510: mokṣasya deśakaḥ śāstā munīnāmeṣa vai dhvajaḥ // Lank_10.819 //
S04bsu021_u:5514: indro virūḍhakādyāśca vanabhūmau dadanti me // Lank_10.821 //
S04bsu021_u:5516: sādhayiṣyatyanutpādaṃ vāṅbhātraṃ kīrtyate tu vai // Lank_10.822 //
S04bsu021_u:5518: antarā kimavasthāsau yāvadrūpaṃ na jānati // Lank_10.823 //
S04bsu021_u:5520: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kiṃcitkimālambya pravartsyate // Lank_10.824 //
S04bsu021_u:5522: na prasiddhaṃ kathaṃ tasya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'vadhāryate // Lank_10.825 //
S04bsu021_u:5526: bhikṣutvaṃ samayaprāptirdṛṣṭā vai kṣaṇikā katham // Lank_10.827 //
S04bsu021_u:5528: abhūtikā ca bhūtāni bhūtāḥ kiṃcitkva cāgatau // Lank_10.828 //
S04bsu021_u:5532: pradhāne vidyate kāryaṃ kāryaṃ svātmaprasādhitam // Lank_10.830 //
S04bsu021_u:5535: yathā hi pāradaḥ śuddha upakleśairna lipyate /
S04bsu021_u:5536: ālayaṃ hi tathā śuddhamāśrayaḥ sarvadehinām // Lank_10.832 //
S04bsu021_u:5539: lavaṇādibhiśca lāvaṇyaṃ bījavatkiṃ na vartate // Lank_10.833 //
S04bsu021_u:5540: anyatve ca tadanyatve ubhayaṃ nobhaye tathā /
S04bsu021_u:5541: astitvaṃ nirupādānaṃ na ca nāsti na saṃskṛtam // Lank_10.834 //
S04bsu021_u:5545: anirdhāryaṃ vadantyātmā nopādāne na cānyataḥ // Lank_10.836 //
S04bsu021_u:5547: ekatvena tadanyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.837 //
S04bsu021_u:5548: darpaṇe udake netre yatha bimbaṃ pradṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:5550: bhāvyaṃ vibhāvanādhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam /
S04bsu021_u:5551: etatrayaṃ vibhāvento mucyante hi kudarśanaiḥ // Lank_10.839 //
S04bsu021_u:5552: dṛṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ yathā vidyuccakraṃ chidragṛhe yathā /
S04bsu021_u:5553: pariṇāmaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bālairiva na kalpayet // Lank_10.840 //
S04bsu021_u:5563: sattvakāyā yathā citrā gatyāgatyāṃ vibhāvayet // Lank_10.845 //
S04bsu021_u:5576: nadīdīpabījavattasya nirgamaḥ kiṃ na kathyate // Lank_10.851 //
S04bsu021_u:5577: anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñānādi na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:5578: tadabhāve na vijñānaṃ saṃtatyā jāyate katham // Lank_10.852 //
S04bsu021_u:5585: pavanaṃ hi vahnerdahanaṃ preraṇe na tu saṃbhave /
S04bsu021_u:5586: prerya nirvāyate tena kathaṃ sattvaprasādhakāḥ // Lank_10.856 //
S04bsu021_u:5590: sattvaḥ pravartitaḥ kena vahnivatkalpyate yataḥ // Lank_10.858 //
S04bsu021_u:5592: nairātmā sārthavannityaṃ cittena saha vartate // Lank_10.859 //
S04bsu021_u:5594: agnirhyasādhakasteṣāṃ na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.860 //
S04bsu021_u:5595: cittaṃ sattvāśca nirvāṇaṃ prakṛtyā bhāsurā nu vai /
S04bsu021_u:5600: dṛṣṭāśca te yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kleśā vidāritāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5603: na ca budhyanti durmedhā avaktavyaśca kathyate // Lank_10.864 //
S04bsu021_u:5605: bherī yathā candanajā bālaiḥ kurvanti nānyathā /
S04bsu021_u:5609: imaṃ nayaṃ yo 'numinoti yuktitaḥ prasādavān yogaparo hyakalpanaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5610: anāśrito hyarthaparo bhavedasau hiraṇmayīṃ dharmagatiṃ pradīpayet // Lank_10.867 //
S04bsu021_u:5611: bhāvābhāvapratyayamohakalpanā kudṛṣṭijālaṃ samalaṃ hi tasya tu /
S04bsu021_u:5612: sarāgadoṣapratighaṃ nivartate nirañjano buddhakaraiśca sicyate // Lank_10.868 //
S04bsu021_u:5616: mano hyālayasaṃbhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ ca manobhavam // Lank_10.870 //
S04bsu021_u:5624: yadā saṃjāyate dṛṣṭiḥ saṃsāraśca pravartate // Lank_10.874 //
S04bsu021_u:5631: nivartate yadā cittaṃ nivṛttaṃ paśyato jagat /
S04bsu021_u:5632: muditāṃ labhate bhūmiṃ buddhabhūmiṃ labhanti ca // Lank_10.878 //
S04bsu021_u:5635: karoti sattvakṛtyāni pratibimbaṃ yathā jale // Lank_10.879 //
S04bsu021_u:5642: yathā hi grantho granthena yuktyā yuktistathā yadi /
S04bsu021_u:5643: ato yuktirbhavedyuktimanyathā tu na kalpayet // Lank_10.883 //
S04bsu021_u:5644: cakṣuḥ karma ca tṛṣṇā ca avidyāyoniśastathā /
S04bsu021_u:5647: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu021_u:5648: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
